title: Budget-Friendly Bali Vacay: Kuta & Ubud Essentials
description: Discover the magic of Bali without breaking the bank with our 'Budget-Friendly Bali Vacay: Kuta & Ubud Essentials' package. This 4-day itinerary focuses on experiencing the vibrant energy of Kuta's beaches and nightlife, combined with a cultural and natural immersion in the artistic hub of Ubud. From breathtaking sunsets and ancient temples to lush rice terraces and mischievous monkeys, this trip offers a taste of Bali's best, perfect for travelers seeking an affordable yet memorable island escape. Base yourself in Kuta at a comfortable mid-range or budget hotel for all 3 nights, ensuring convenience and ease of travel.
highlights: Relax and enjoy the vibrant Kuta Beach with its stunning sunsets.
Experience the spiritual grandeur of Uluwatu Temple perched on a cliff edge.
Witness the captivating Kecak Dance, a traditional Balinese cultural performance.
Indulge in a fresh seafood dinner on the sands of Jimbaran Beach.
Explore the artistic and natural wonders of Ubud, including the Tegenungan Waterfall and Tegallalang Rice Terraces.
Encounter playful monkeys at the Sacred Monkey Forest Sanctuary.
Discover the royal heritage at Ubud Palace and find unique souvenirs at Ubud Art Market.
Option to enjoy thrilling water sports activities at Kuta Beach.
Convenient base in Kuta for all nights, minimizing transfers.

itinerary.title: Arrival in Bali – Kuta Leisure Day
itinerary.description: Upon your arrival at Ngurah Rai International Airport (Denpasar - DPS), you will be warmly greeted by our representative. Enjoy a private transfer to your pre-booked hotel in Kuta. After check-in and refreshing, the rest of the day is at your leisure. In the evening, head to Kuta Beach to witness a spectacular Balinese sunset, a perfect way to start your vacation. You have the optional choice to visit the modern Beachwalk Shopping Center for some retail therapy or explore the vibrant streets to try delicious local street food. Overnight stay in Kuta.

itinerary.title: Explore Kuta – Beach, Culture & Nightlife
itinerary.description: After breakfast at your hotel, start your day with a visit to Kuta Beach. Here, you can relax, swim, or opt for thrilling watersports activities like surfing lessons (on direct payment). In the afternoon, embark on a cultural journey to Uluwatu Temple, a magnificent sea temple perched on a cliff, offering breathtaking ocean views. Afterward, immerse yourself in Balinese cultural history by watching the captivating Kecak Dance performance against the backdrop of the sunset (entry tickets included). Consider indulging in a traditional Balinese spa/massage (optional, direct payment) for relaxation. In the evening, enjoy a memorable sunset dinner at Jimbaran Beach, savoring fresh seafood grilled to perfection (dinner cost separate). For those seeking nightlife, there's an optional visit to Sky Garden or Potato Head Beach Club (on direct payment). Overnight stay in Kuta.

itinerary.title: Day Trip to Ubud – Nature & Culture
itinerary.description: After breakfast at your hotel, embark on a full-day tour to the spiritual and cultural heart of Bali, Ubud (approx. 1.5–2 hours drive from Kuta). Your sightseeing includes the stunning Tegenungan Waterfall, where you can take a refreshing dip. Next, marvel at the iconic cascading greenery of the Tegallalang Rice Terraces. Continue to the mystical Sacred Monkey Forest Sanctuary, home to hundreds of playful macaque monkeys. Explore the historical Ubud Palace and browse for unique handicrafts and souvenirs at the bustling Ubud Art Market. For thrill-seekers and Instagram enthusiasts, there's an optional Bali Swing experience (on direct payment) offering incredible photo opportunities amidst the lush landscapes. In the evening, return to Kuta. Overnight stay in Kuta.

itinerary.title: Departure from Bali
itinerary.description: After breakfast and check-out from your hotel, you will have time for some last-minute activities depending on your flight schedule. You can indulge in some final shopping at Discovery Mall or explore the local crafts at Kuta Art Market for souvenirs to take home. Later, you will be transferred to Ngurah Rai International Airport (Denpasar - DPS) for your departure. Depart with beautiful memories of your budget-friendly Bali vacay. Package starting from 25,000 INR per person.

inclusions: 3 nights accommodation in a comfortable mid-range or budget hotel in Kuta.
Daily breakfast at the hotel.
Private transfers from/to Denpasar Airport.
All sightseeing and tours in a private air-conditioned vehicle as per itinerary (Day 2 & Day 3).
English-speaking driver/guide for tours.

Entry fees for Tegenungan Waterfall, Tegallalang Rice Terraces, Sacred Monkey Forest Sanctuary, and Ubud Palace (Day 3).
All parking fees, road tolls, and driver allowances.
CircleTrip Holidays support throughout the trip.
exclusions: International and domestic flights to/from Denpasar (Bali).

title: Bali Bliss Escape: Beaches, Islands & Ubud Serenity
description: Indulge in the ultimate tropical getaway with our 'Bali Bliss Escape: Beaches, Islands & Ubud Serenity' package. This 6-day immersive journey takes you through the diverse wonders of Bali, from the lively beaches and thrilling water sports of Kuta to the breathtaking cliffs of Uluwatu, the raw beauty of Nusa Penida, and the tranquil, cultural heart of Ubud. Experience luxury with a private pool villa stay in Ubud and create unforgettable memories in this island paradise. Price starting from 32,000 INR per person.
highlights: Unwind and explore the vibrant beach culture of Kuta.
Experience thrilling water sports at Tanjung Benoa, including Banana Boat, Jet Ski & Parasailing.
Witness the majestic Uluwatu Temple perched on a cliff and enjoy the mesmerizing Kecak Fire Dance at sunset.
Embark on an adventurous full-day excursion to Nusa Penida, exploring iconic spots like Angel’s Billabong, Broken Beach, Crystal Bay, and Kelingking Beach.
Enjoy a scenic drive to Ubud, with a stop at the Mount Batur Volcano Viewpoint.
Capture unforgettable moments with the famous Bali Swing experience.
Marvel at the lush Tegallalang Rice Terrace and the beautiful Tegenungan Waterfall.
Indulge in a luxurious stay at a private pool villa in the serene surroundings of Ubud.
Opportunity for leisure and relaxation in Ubud, with optional spa treatments or yoga sessions.

itinerary.title: Arrival in Bali – Leisure Day in Kuta
itinerary.description: Upon your arrival at Ngurah Rai International Airport (Denpasar - DPS), you will be warmly greeted by our representative. Enjoy a private transfer to your pre-booked hotel in Kuta. After check-in and refreshing, the rest of the day is at your leisure. You can unwind by the beach, explore the vibrant local cafes, or simply relax at your hotel. In the evening, immerse yourself in the lively atmosphere of Kuta. Overnight in Kuta.

itinerary.title: Thrill & Culture Day: Water Sports & Uluwatu
itinerary.description: After breakfast, prepare for a day of excitement and cultural immersion. In the morning, head to Tanjung Benoa Beach for an exhilarating Water Sports Package including Banana Boat ride, Jet Ski, and Parasailing. Enjoy the clear waters and thrilling activities. In the afternoon, visit the iconic Uluwatu Temple, a stunning sea temple perched on a cliff-edge, offering breathtaking panoramic views of the Indian Ocean. As the sun begins to set, witness the mesmerizing Kecak Fire Dance, a traditional Balinese ritual performance (tickets included). Overnight stay in Kuta.

itinerary.title: Nusa Penida West Island Tour
itinerary.description: After breakfast, embark on a full-day adventurous excursion to Nusa Penida West Island. You will be transferred to Sanur Harbour for a fast boat transfer to Nusa Penida. Upon arrival, a local vehicle will take you to explore the island's most iconic natural wonders: the picturesque natural rock pool of Angel’s Billabong, the unique archway and crashing waves at Broken Beach, the pristine white sands of Crystal Bay, and the magnificent T-Rex shaped cliff of Kelingking Beach, offering iconic photo opportunities. A delicious local Indonesian lunch will be provided during the tour. In the evening, take the boat back to Sanur and transfer to your hotel in Kuta. Overnight in Kuta.

itinerary.title: Journey to Ubud – Nature & Adventure
itinerary.description: After breakfast and check-out from your Kuta hotel, begin your transfer to the serene and artistic town of Ubud. En route, make a stop at Mount Batur Volcano Viewpoint for stunning panoramic views of the active volcano and its caldera lake. Next, enjoy the thrill and capture amazing Instagram moments with the famous Bali Swing experience. Continue to explore the iconic cascading greenery of Tegallalang Rice Terrace and the beautiful Tegenungan Waterfall, where you can take a refreshing dip. Upon arrival in Ubud, check-in to your luxurious private pool villa. The evening is free to relax in your villa or explore Ubud's charming surroundings. Overnight in Ubud.

itinerary.title: Leisure Day in Ubud
itinerary.description: Today is a day dedicated to leisure and relaxation in the tranquil setting of your private pool villa in Ubud. Enjoy the privacy and amenities of your villa, whether it's swimming in your private pool, lounging by the sundeck, or simply unwinding amidst nature. You have the optional choice to indulge in a rejuvenating Balinese spa treatment or participate in a peaceful yoga class (on your own arrangement and direct payment) in one of Ubud's renowned wellness centers. Explore the local artistry, cafes, or simply soak in the peaceful ambiance. Overnight in Ubud.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: After breakfast at your villa and check-out, you will be provided a private transfer to Ngurah Rai International Airport (Denpasar - DPS) for your onward journey. Depart with 'Bali Bliss Escape' and cherished memories of your extraordinary Bali vacation. Price starting from 32,000 INR per person.

2 Nights accommodation in a luxurious private pool villa in Ubud.
Daily breakfast at the hotels/villas (starting with breakfast on Day 2, ending with breakfast on Day 6).

title: Islands & Temples Retreat: Bali & Nusa Penida Immersion
description: Embark on the 'Islands & Temples Retreat', a 7-day journey designed to immerse you in the diverse beauty and spiritual essence of Bali and its stunning neighboring island, Nusa Penida. This comprehensive package offers a perfect blend of beach adventures in Kuta, an overnight stay on the raw and picturesque Nusa Penida, and a tranquil retreat in a private pool villa in the cultural heart of Ubud. From exhilarating water sports to ancient temples, iconic natural wonders, and serene rice terraces, this voyage promises an unforgettable Balinese experience. You'll spend 2 nights in Kuta, 1 night in Nusa Penida, and 3 nights in a private pool villa in Ubud.
highlights: Enjoy thrilling water sports activities at Tanjung Benoa, including Banana Boat, Jet Ski, and Parasailing.
Witness the majestic Uluwatu Temple at sunset and experience the captivating Kecak Dance.
Experience an authentic island stay with an overnight on Nusa Penida, exploring its unique charm.
Discover the iconic natural wonders of Nusa Penida's West side: Angel’s Billabong, Broken Beach, Crystal Bay, and the famed Kelingking Beach.
Indulge in an adventurous Bali Swing experience amidst lush landscapes.
Marvel at the panoramic views of Mount Batur Volcano.
Explore the stunning Tegallalang Rice Terrace and the refreshing Tegenungan Waterfall.
Participate in a spiritual purification ritual at Tirta Empul Holy Spring Temple.
Luxuriate in a private pool villa for three nights in the serene environment of Ubud.

itinerary.title: Arrival in Bali – Kuta Check-in
itinerary.description: Upon your arrival at Ngurah Rai International Airport (Denpasar - DPS), you will be warmly greeted by our representative. Enjoy a private transfer to your pre-booked hotel in Kuta. After check-in, the rest of the day is free for you to relax. You can head to the nearby beaches to soak up the sun, explore local cafes, or wander through the lively markets. Overnight stay in Kuta.

itinerary.title: Adventure & Sunset Culture
itinerary.description: After breakfast, prepare for an exciting day of adventure and cultural immersion. In the morning, head to Tanjung Benoa Beach for an exhilarating Water Sports Package which includes a Banana Boat ride, Jet Ski, and Parasailing (all included). Enjoy the thrill of these activities in the clear waters. In the afternoon, visit the magnificent Uluwatu Temple, dramatically perched on a cliff-edge offering breathtaking ocean views. As the sun begins its descent, witness the mesmerizing Kecak Dance performance at the cliff-top amphitheater (tickets included), an iconic Balinese cultural experience. Overnight stay in Kuta.

itinerary.title: Ferry to Nusa Penida + Island Leisure
itinerary.description: After breakfast and check-out from your Kuta hotel, you will be transferred to Sanur Harbour for a fast boat transfer to Nusa Penida. Upon arrival, you will be met and transferred to your hotel in Nusa Penida. The rest of the day is at your leisure to explore the local area. You can relax at the beautiful Crystal Bay, known for its calm waters and excellent snorkeling, or simply enjoy a peaceful island evening, soaking in the laid-back atmosphere of Nusa Penida. Overnight stay in Nusa Penida.

itinerary.title: Nusa Penida West Tour + Transfer to Ubud
itinerary.description: After breakfast and check-out from your Nusa Penida hotel, embark on a captivating Nusa Penida West Tour. A local vehicle will take you to explore the island's most iconic natural wonders: the picturesque natural rock pool of Angel’s Billabong, the unique archway and crashing waves at Broken Beach, and the magnificent T-Rex shaped cliff of Kelingking Beach, offering some of Bali's most famous photo opportunities. A delicious local Indonesian lunch will be provided during the tour. In the afternoon, take the return fast boat to mainland Bali (Sanur Harbour) and then transfer to your luxurious private pool villa in Ubud. Check-in and relax. Overnight in Ubud.

itinerary.title: Ubud Countryside Tour
itinerary.description: After breakfast at your villa, embark on an immersive Ubud Countryside Tour. Begin with an exhilarating experience on the famous Bali Swing, offering breathtaking views and incredible photo opportunities amidst lush greenery. Next, visit a local Coffee Plantation to learn about the process of making various types of coffee, including the famous Luwak coffee (tasting optional). Continue to marvel at the iconic cascading emerald greenery of the Tegallalang Rice Terrace. Conclude your tour with a visit to the beautiful Tegenungan Waterfall, where you can take a refreshing dip. Overnight stay in Ubud.

itinerary.title: Culture & Views Day in Ubud
itinerary.description: After breakfast, delve deeper into the cultural and natural beauty around Ubud. First, visit the Mount Batur Volcano Viewpoint for stunning panoramic views of the active volcano and its serene crater lake. Next, experience a spiritual cleansing ritual at the sacred Tirta Empul Holy Spring Temple, a significant Hindu temple where Balinese Hindus go for purification. The rest of the day is at your leisure. You can opt to visit the bustling Ubud Art Market for unique souvenirs and local crafts, or explore nearby art galleries and cultural sites. Overnight stay in Ubud.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: After breakfast at your villa and check-out, you will be provided a private transfer to Ngurah Rai International Airport (Denpasar - DPS) for your onward journey. Depart with 'Islands & Temples Retreat' and cherished memories of your incredible Bali and Nusa Penida adventure. Package starting from 37,000 INR per person.

title: Dubai Pulse: City, Desert & Skyline
description: Experience the vibrant 'Dubai Pulse: City, Desert & Skyline', a compact yet comprehensive 4-day itinerary designed to capture the essence of this dynamic city. From the futuristic skyscrapers and iconic landmarks to exhilarating desert adventures and traditional Arabian experiences, this package offers a perfect blend of excitement and culture. Immerse yourself in the dazzling cityscape, the tranquility of the desert, and the rich heritage of Dubai.
highlights: Enjoy a luxurious Marina Dhow Cruise with a buffet dinner, traditional Tanoura show, and stunning skyline views.
Embark on an adventurous Desert Safari including thrilling dune bashing, camel riding, and sandboarding.
Experience an authentic Arabian evening with a BBQ dinner, belly dance, and fire show in the desert camp.
Discover Dubai's iconic landmarks on a half-day city tour, including Jumeirah Mosque, Burj Al Arab (photo stop), and views of Atlantis, The Palm.
Explore the vibrant traditional markets of Gold and Spice Souks.
Ascend to the 124th floor of the majestic Burj Khalifa for unparalleled panoramic city views.
Witness the spectacular Dubai Fountain Show at the foot of Burj Khalifa and indulge in shopping at Dubai Mall.

itinerary.title: Arrival & Dhow Cruise
itinerary.description: Upon your arrival at Dubai International Airport (DXB), you will be met by our representative and transferred on a shared basis to your comfortable hotel in Dubai. Complete the check-in formalities and take some time to refresh. In the evening, prepare for a enchanting Marina Dhow Cruise. Sail along the stunning Dubai Marina, enjoying panoramic views of the illuminated skyscrapers and modern architecture. Indulge in a delicious international buffet dinner while being entertained by a captivating Tanoura show. Overnight stay in Dubai.

itinerary.title: Desert Safari Adventure
itinerary.description: Enjoy breakfast at your hotel. The morning is at leisure for you to relax or explore nearby areas on your own. In the afternoon, get ready for an exhilarating Desert Safari adventure. You will be picked up from your hotel on a shared basis and driven into the golden dunes. Experience thrilling dune bashing in a 4x4 vehicle, try your hand at camel riding, and enjoy sandboarding. As the sun sets, head to a traditional Bedouin-style desert camp where you'll savor a sumptuous BBQ dinner under the stars, accompanied by mesmerizing belly dance and fire shows. Overnight stay in Dubai.

itinerary.title: City Tour + Burj Khalifa & Dubai Mall
itinerary.description: After breakfast, embark on a morning half-day city tour of Dubai. Visit prominent landmarks such as the majestic Jumeirah Mosque (photo stop), take a photo stop outside the iconic Burj Al Arab hotel, and admire views of Atlantis, The Palm on the artificial island of The Palm Jumeirah. Explore the bustling traditional markets of Gold Souk and Spice Souk, where you can haggle for unique souvenirs. In the afternoon, visit the world's tallest building, the Burj Khalifa. Ascend to the 124th floor (non-prime hours) for breathtaking panoramic views of the city skyline. Afterward, spend time at the colossal Dubai Mall, one of the largest shopping malls in the world. In the evening, witness the spectacular Dubai Fountain Show at the base of Burj Khalifa, a mesmerizing choreographed water performance. Overnight stay in Dubai.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: After breakfast at your hotel and check-out, you will be provided with a shared transfer to Dubai International Airport (DXB) for your onward journey. Depart with 'Dubai Pulse' and unforgettable memories of this dazzling city. Package starting from 27,000 INR per person.

inclusions: 3 Nights accommodation in a comfortable hotel in Dubai.
Daily breakfast at the hotel (starting with breakfast on Day 2, ending with breakfast on Day 4).

highlights: Experience a comfortable arrival and leisure time in Dubai.
Ascend the magnificent Burj Khalifa for breathtaking panoramic views of the cityscape.
Explore the historical charm of Al Fahidi Historical Neighbourhood (Bastakiya Quarter) and the cultural insights at Dubai Museum.
Enjoy a scenic drive past iconic structures like Palm Jumeirah and a leisurely walk along Marina Walk.
Relax at Jumeirah Beach with stunning views of Burj Al Arab.
Indulge in an exhilarating 4x4 desert safari complete with thrilling dune bashing, traditional shisha, intricate henna painting, and a sumptuous BBQ dinner.
Be entertained by captivating live shows including belly dancing and Tanoura performances under the desert stars.
Wander through the stunning, seasonal Dubai Miracle Garden, a vibrant floral wonderland (seasonal operation, typically November to May).
Immerse yourself in diverse global cultures, entertainment, and shopping at Global Village.

itinerary.title: Arrival & Leisure
itinerary.description: Upon your arrival at Dubai International Airport (DXB), you will be warmly met by our representative and transferred on a shared basis to your pre-booked hotel in Dubai. After completing the check-in formalities, the rest of the day is free for you to relax and settle in. You can choose to explore the nearby areas at your own pace, enjoy a leisurely stroll around the hotel vicinity, or make use of its amenities. For an unforgettable evening, consider an optional visit to the dazzling La Perle show or a trip to the iconic Dubai Frame (on request, additional cost). Overnight stay in Dubai.

itinerary.title: Classic City & Culture
itinerary.description: After breakfast at your hotel, embark on a captivating half-day city tour of Dubai. Begin by delving into the rich history at the Dubai Museum, housed in the ancient Al Fahidi Fort. Wander through the charming narrow alleyways of the Al Fahidi Historical Neighbourhood (Bastakiya Quarter), admiring its traditional wind-tower architecture. Marvel at the architectural marvels of Palm Jumeirah, the world's largest artificial island, and enjoy a scenic walk along the vibrant Marina Walk, offering stunning views of yachts and skyscrapers. Take in the sun and sand at Jumeirah Beach with a picturesque view of the iconic Burj Al Arab. In the afternoon, prepare for an awe-inspiring visit to the Burj Khalifa – ascend to the 124th floor (non-prime hours) for unparalleled panoramic views of the city. Conclude your day with leisure time for shopping and exploring the magnificent Dubai Mall, one of the world's largest retail and entertainment destinations, and witness the captivating Dubai Fountain Show. Overnight stay in Dubai.

itinerary.title: Desert Safari Thrill
itinerary.description: Enjoy a leisurely morning after breakfast. In the late afternoon (typically between 3:00 PM - 4:00 PM), get ready for an exhilarating desert adventure! Our 4x4 vehicle will pick you up from your hotel on a shared basis for an unforgettable dune bashing experience across the golden sands of Dubai. As the sun begins to set, arrive at a traditional Bedouin-style desert camp where you can enjoy various activities like shisha smoking, intricate henna painting, and a delicious BBQ dinner under the stars. The evening will be enlivened with captivating live shows, including graceful belly dancing and mesmerizing Tanoura performances. Return to your hotel for an overnight stay in Dubai.

itinerary.title: Miracle Garden + Global Village
itinerary.description: After breakfast, your morning will be dedicated to exploring the breathtaking Dubai Miracle Garden (please note: this attraction operates seasonally, typically from November to May; if traveling outside these months, an alternative attraction will be provided). Witness an extraordinary display of millions of flowers arranged in stunning designs, sculptures, and vibrant patterns. In the evening, transfer to Global Village, a unique multicultural theme park that offers a blend of entertainment, shopping, and international cuisine from around the world. Immerse yourself in the diverse cultures, enjoy thrilling rides, and explore pavilions representing different countries. Overnight stay in Dubai.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: After a delightful breakfast at the hotel, enjoy some free time until your scheduled shared transfer to Dubai International Airport (DXB) for your departure, carrying wonderful memories of your 'Dubai Dreams' adventure. Price starting from 33,000 INR per person.

title: Twin Cities Escape: Dubai & Abu Dhabi Grand Tour
description: Embark on an unforgettable 'Twin Cities Escape: Dubai & Abu Dhabi Grand Tour' to discover the dazzling highlights of the United Arab Emirates. This 6-day itinerary offers a perfect blend of futuristic marvels, rich cultural experiences, and thrilling adventures. From ascending the iconic Burj Khalifa and experiencing an authentic desert safari to exploring the grandeur of the Sheikh Zayed Grand Mosque and choosing your excitement at world-class theme parks in Abu Dhabi, this package ensures an immersive journey through the best of two magnificent cities. You'll enjoy 3 nights in Dubai and 2 nights in Abu Dhabi, with comfortable accommodations and seamless transfers.
highlights: Ascend the world's tallest building, Burj Khalifa, for unparalleled panoramic city views.
Experience the thrill of an authentic desert safari with exhilarating dune bashing, cultural performances (belly dance, Tanoura show), and a sumptuous BBQ dinner under the stars.

Explore Dubai's iconic landmarks on a comprehensive city tour, including a photo stop at the magnificent Dubai Frame, relaxing time at Jumeirah Beach, a glimpse of the iconic Burj Al Arab, and a scenic drive through the bustling Dubai Marina.
Marvel at the breathtaking architecture and spiritual grandeur of the Sheikh Zayed Grand Mosque in Abu Dhabi.
Discover the cultural richness of the UAE at the Heritage Village in Abu Dhabi, showcasing traditional Emirati life.
Choose your ultimate adventure with a full-day pass to either Ferrari World (for speed enthusiasts) or Warner Bros. World (for animation and superhero fans) in Abu Dhabi.
Enjoy convenient shared transfers throughout your journey between cities and to attractions.

itinerary.title: Arrival in Dubai & Leisure
itinerary.description: Upon your arrival at Dubai International Airport (DXB), you will be warmly met by our representative and transferred comfortably on a shared basis to your pre-booked hotel in Dubai. After checking in and settling down, you'll have the evening free to relax and unwind at your leisure, or explore the nearby areas at your own pace. For an enchanting start to your trip, we highly recommend an optional Dhow Cruise Dinner (at additional cost), offering stunning views of Dubai's illuminated skyline from the creek while enjoying a delicious buffet meal and live entertainment. Overnight stay in Dubai.

itinerary.title: Burj Khalifa + Dubai City Tour
itinerary.description: After breakfast at your hotel, prepare for a day of iconic sightseeing. Your adventure begins with a visit to the Burj Khalifa's 'At The Top' on the 124th floor (non-prime hours), offering breathtaking panoramic views of the city's vast landscape and coastline. Afterward, you'll have leisure time to explore the colossal Dubai Mall, one of the world's largest shopping and entertainment destinations, located at the base of the Burj Khalifa. In the afternoon, embark on a comprehensive Dubai City Tour (shared basis), showcasing the city's modern and traditional highlights. This includes a photo stop at the magnificent Dubai Frame, relaxing time at Jumeirah Beach with a stunning view of the iconic Burj Al Arab, and a scenic drive through the bustling Dubai Marina. Overnight stay in Dubai.

itinerary.title: Desert Safari Adventure
itinerary.description: Enjoy a relaxed morning after breakfast, perhaps indulging in some last-minute shopping or leisure time at your hotel. In the late afternoon (typically between 3:00 PM - 4:00 PM), get ready for an exhilarating Desert Safari adventure! Our 4x4 vehicle will pick you up from your hotel on a shared basis for an unforgettable dune bashing experience across the golden sands of Dubai. As evening approaches, arrive at a traditional Bedouin-style desert camp where you'll enjoy cultural entertainment like captivating belly dancing and mesmerizing Tanoura shows, along with opportunities for traditional henna painting and shisha. A sumptuous BBQ dinner under the stars completes this unforgettable desert experience. Overnight stay in Dubai.

itinerary.title: Transfer to Abu Dhabi + Grand Mosque & Heritage Village
itinerary.description: After breakfast, check out from your Dubai hotel as you embark on a scenic transfer (shared basis) to the capital city, Abu Dhabi. Upon arrival, you'll be taken for a half-day city tour (shared basis) that includes a visit to the awe-inspiring Sheikh Zayed Grand Mosque, one of the world's largest and most magnificent mosques, a true architectural masterpiece. Later, explore the Heritage Village, which offers a fascinating glimpse into traditional Emirati life, customs, and craftsmanship before the oil boom. Check into your comfortable hotel in Abu Dhabi in the evening. Overnight stay in Abu Dhabi.

itinerary.title: Abu Dhabi Theme Park Thrills (Ferrari World or Warner Bros.)
itinerary.description: Today is dedicated to thrilling entertainment! After breakfast, you'll have a full day at either Ferrari World OR Warner Bros. World, where you can choose the theme park that best suits your interests. Ferrari World offers adrenaline-pumping rides and attractions inspired by the legendary car brand, including the world's fastest rollercoaster, Formula Rossa. Warner Bros. World brings beloved cartoon characters and immersive worlds (like Gotham City and Metropolis) to life with state-of-the-art rides and entertainment. For those interested in art and culture, an optional visit to the Louvre Museum Abu Dhabi is also available (additional cost), a stunning architectural marvel housing diverse global art. Overnight stay in Abu Dhabi.

itinerary.title: Departure from Abu Dhabi or Dubai
itinerary.description: Enjoy your final breakfast at the hotel. Depending on your flight schedule and departure airport, you will be transferred on a shared basis to either Abu Dhabi International Airport (AUH) or Dubai International Airport (DXB) for your onward journey, taking with you cherished memories of your 'Twin Cities Escape' adventure. Price starting from 37,000 INR per person.

2 Nights accommodation in a comfortable hotel in Abu Dhabi.

title: Luxury Layers: Dubai's Iconic Wonders & Desert Opulence
description: Indulge in the opulence and grandeur of Dubai with our 'Luxury Layers: Dubai's Iconic Wonders & Desert Opulence' package. This 6-day itinerary is meticulously crafted to offer you an immersive experience of Dubai's iconic landmarks, world-class entertainment, and thrilling desert adventures, all while enjoying premium comfort and privacy. From futuristic architecture to vibrant cultural experiences and serene beaches, discover every luxurious layer this magnificent city has to offer. You'll enjoy 5 nights of luxury hotel accommodation in Dubai.
highlights: Experience a comfortable and luxurious arrival with private airport transfers.
Explore Dubai's modern architectural marvels including the Dubai Frame, the iconic Palm Jumeirah, Museum of the Future (photo stop), and Bluewaters Island, home to Ain Dubai.
Relax and enjoy a beautiful sunset at the stylish beachfront destination, La Mer Beach.
Ascend to the 124th floor of the magnificent Burj Khalifa for breathtaking panoramic city views.
Immerse yourself in the aquatic wonders at the Dubai Mall Aquarium & Underwater Zoo.
Witness the mesmerizing Dubai Fountain show, a spectacular display of water, music, and light.
Wander through the vibrant and stunning floral displays of the seasonal Dubai Miracle Garden (operates November to May).
Experience diverse global cultures, entertainment, and shopping at Global Village, a unique multicultural theme park.
Embark on an exhilarating desert safari with thrilling dune bashing, traditional entertainment (belly dancing, Tanoura show), and a delicious BBQ dinner under the stars.

itinerary.title: Arrival & Leisure in Dubai
itinerary.description: Upon your arrival at Dubai International Airport (DXB), you will be warmly greeted by our representative and transferred on a private basis to your luxurious hotel in Dubai. After checking in and settling down, you'll have the rest of the day to relax and unwind at your leisure. You can choose to explore the vibrant Dubai Marina in the evening, with its stunning skyline, impressive yachts, and an array of high-end dining options. Alternatively, relax and enjoy the amenities of your luxury hotel. Overnight stay in Dubai.

itinerary.title: Full-Day City Tour & La Mer Beach
itinerary.description: After a delightful breakfast, embark on a comprehensive full-day Dubai City Tour (private basis). Your journey begins with a visit to the stunning Dubai Frame, a magnificent architectural landmark offering panoramic views of both old and new Dubai. Drive past the iconic Palm Jumeirah, the world-famous man-made island, and capture memorable photos at the futuristic Museum of the Future (photo stop). Explore the chic Bluewaters Island, home to the majestic Ain Dubai (photo stop). As the day concludes, head to La Mer Beach to enjoy a beautiful sunset, relaxing by the stylish beachfront with its unique boutiques, art installations, and cafes. Overnight stay in Dubai.

itinerary.title: Burj Khalifa, Dubai Mall & Aquarium
itinerary.description: Today's highlight begins with a visit to the world's tallest building, the Burj Khalifa. Ascend to the 124th floor (non-prime hours) for unparalleled panoramic views of Dubai's sprawling cityscape. Afterward, immerse yourself in the world of shopping and entertainment at the colossal Dubai Mall. Explore the fascinating wonders of the Dubai Aquarium & Underwater Zoo, home to thousands of aquatic animals including sharks and rays. In the evening, witness the captivating Dubai Fountain show, a mesmerizing choreographed water, music, and light spectacle at the base of Burj Khalifa, followed by some leisure time for high-end shopping in the mall. Overnight stay in Dubai.

itinerary.title: Miracle Garden + Global Village
itinerary.description: After breakfast, your morning will be dedicated to the enchanting Dubai Miracle Garden (please note: this attraction operates seasonally, typically from November to May; if traveling outside these months, an alternative attraction will be provided). Wander amidst millions of vibrant flowers arranged in spectacular designs, sculptures, and patterns. In the afternoon and evening, experience the diverse cultures and entertainment at Global Village, a unique open-air theme park offering pavilions from various countries, thrilling live shows, delicious international cuisine, and extensive shopping opportunities. Overnight stay in Dubai.

itinerary.title: Desert Safari Adventure
itinerary.description: Enjoy a leisurely morning to relax at your luxurious hotel, perhaps indulging in some last-minute souvenir shopping or spa treatments (optional, direct payment). In the afternoon, get ready for an exhilarating Desert Safari adventure! Our 4x4 vehicle will pick you up for a thrilling dune bashing experience across the golden sands. At a traditional Bedouin-style desert camp, indulge in activities like camel riding, shisha smoking, intricate henna painting, and enjoy captivating live entertainment including graceful belly dancing and mesmerizing Tanoura shows. A delectable BBQ dinner under the starlit desert sky completes your adventure. Overnight stay in Dubai.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: After a delightful breakfast at your hotel, enjoy some free time until your scheduled private transfer to Dubai International Airport (DXB) for your departure. Depart with incredible memories of your luxurious 'Luxury Layers' escape in Dubai. Package starting from 35,000 INR per person.

title: Arabian Fusion
description: Experience the ultimate 'Arabian Fusion' with this meticulously crafted 7-day itinerary covering the best of Abu Dhabi and Dubai. This package offers a harmonious blend of cultural immersion, thrilling adventures, futuristic marvels, and luxurious experiences across the United Arab Emirates. From the serene grandeur of the Sheikh Zayed Grand Mosque to the exhilarating heights of the Burj Khalifa and the excitement of world-class theme parks, prepare for an unforgettable journey through these dazzling cities.
highlights: Witness the majestic Sheikh Zayed Grand Mosque, an architectural masterpiece.
Experience adrenaline rushes at either Warner Bros. World or Ferrari World in Abu Dhabi.
Ascend the iconic Burj Khalifa for unparalleled panoramic views of Dubai.
Embark on an exhilarating desert safari with traditional entertainment and a delicious BBQ dinner.
Explore Dubai's modern marvels on a comprehensive city tour.
Enjoy a day of leisure or choose from exciting optional add-ons like Atlantis Aquaventure or Sky Views.

itinerary.title: Arrival in Abu Dhabi
itinerary.description: Upon your arrival at either Abu Dhabi International Airport (AUH) or Dubai International Airport (DXB), you will be met by our representative and comfortably transferred to your hotel in Abu Dhabi. After check-in, the evening is dedicated to visiting the awe-inspiring Sheikh Zayed Grand Mosque, a true architectural marvel that shines beautifully as the sun sets. Spend time marveling at its intricate design and serene ambiance. Overnight stay in Abu Dhabi.

itinerary.title: Abu Dhabi Theme Park
itinerary.description: After breakfast, prepare for a day of thrilling entertainment! You'll have the choice to visit either Warner Bros. World Abu Dhabi or Ferrari World Abu Dhabi. Warner Bros. World offers immersive experiences with beloved characters, while Ferrari World boasts high-speed rides and attractions dedicated to the iconic car brand. In the evening, you can opt for a leisurely walk along the Corniche or an enriching visit to the Louvre Abu Dhabi (optional, additional cost). Overnight stay in Abu Dhabi.

itinerary.title: Transfer to Dubai
itinerary.description: After breakfast and checking out, you will be transferred from Abu Dhabi to Dubai. En route, we'll make a stop at Yas Island for photo opportunities or a quick shopping break at Yas Mall. You'll also have the option to visit the magnificent Qasr Al Watan (Presidential Palace), showcasing exquisite Arabian craftsmanship and heritage (optional, additional cost). Upon arrival in Dubai, check into your hotel. The evening is free to relax. Overnight stay in Dubai.

itinerary.title: Dubai City + Burj Khalifa
itinerary.description: After breakfast, embark on a captivating half-day Dubai City Tour, exploring both the historical and modern facets of this vibrant metropolis. Visit iconic landmarks and picturesque spots. In the afternoon, ascend to the 124th floor of the Burj Khalifa (non-prime hours), the world's tallest building, for breathtaking panoramic views. Afterward, enjoy leisure time at the colossal Dubai Mall, perfect for shopping, dining, and experiencing the mesmerizing Dubai Fountain Show in the evening. Overnight stay in Dubai.

itinerary.title: Desert Safari
itinerary.description: Enjoy a leisurely morning in Dubai, perhaps for some personal exploration or souvenir shopping. In the afternoon, prepare for an exhilarating Desert Safari experience. Our 4x4 vehicle will pick you up for an adrenaline-pumping dune bashing ride across the golden sands. As evening approaches, arrive at a traditional Bedouin-style camp where you'll enjoy camel riding, shisha, henna painting, live entertainment including belly dancing and Tanoura shows, and a sumptuous BBQ dinner under the starlit desert sky. Overnight stay in Dubai.

itinerary.title: Day at Leisure or Optional Add-On
itinerary.description: Today is a free day for you to explore Dubai at your own pace or choose from an array of exciting optional add-ons. You could visit Atlantis Aquaventure Waterpark for a day of aquatic fun, experience the stunning views from Sky Views Observatory, or immerse yourself in the entertainment at Dubai Parks & Resorts (Bollywood Parks, Motiongate, LEGOLAND). Your evening is at leisure to enjoy Dubai's vibrant nightlife or exquisite dining. Overnight stay in Dubai.

itinerary.description: After a final breakfast at your hotel, enjoy some free time until your scheduled transfer to either Dubai International Airport (DXB) or Abu Dhabi International Airport (AUH) for your departure, bringing an end to your incredible 'Arabian Fusion' journey. Package starts from 39K per person.

title: Soul of Singapore
description: Discover the vibrant 'Soul of Singapore' on this captivating 5-day journey. This package offers a perfect blend of futuristic attractions, lush greenery, and thrilling entertainment. From the nocturnal wonders of the Night Safari to the stunning Supertrees of Gardens by the Bay, and the exhilarating rides at Universal Studios, get ready to experience the best of this dynamic island nation. Enjoy comfortable accommodations and seamless transfers for a truly memorable escape.
highlights: Embark on an unforgettable Night Safari, the world's first nocturnal zoo.
Explore the futuristic beauty of Gardens by the Bay, including the Cloud Forest and Flower Dome.
Experience the thrill and magic of Universal Studios Singapore.
Enjoy a scenic Cable Car ride to Sentosa Island.
Discover marine wonders at S.E.A. Aquarium.
Witness the spectacular Wings of Time night show on Sentosa Island.
Take in the city's iconic landmarks on a half-day city tour, including Merlion Park and Marina Bay.

itinerary.title: Arrival + Night Safari
itinerary.description: Upon your arrival at Singapore Changi Airport (SIN), you will be met by our representative and transferred to your hotel for check-in. After settling in, the evening brings a unique adventure as you visit the Night Safari, the world's first nocturnal zoo. Explore the park on a tram ride, observing over 2,500 animals in their naturalistic nocturnal habitats. Enjoy captivating creature shows before returning to your hotel for an overnight stay in Singapore.

itinerary.title: Half-Day City Tour + Gardens by the Bay
itinerary.description: After breakfast, embark on a comprehensive half-day city tour of Singapore. Drive past iconic landmarks such as Suntec City, the bustling Orchard Road, and make a photo stop at Merlion Park for stunning views of the city skyline and Marina Bay. In the afternoon, immerse yourself in the futuristic wonderland of Gardens by the Bay. Explore the magnificent Cloud Forest with its indoor waterfall and diverse plant life, and the vibrant Flower Dome, showcasing exotic flora from around the world. For an optional breathtaking experience, consider visiting the Marina Bay Sands SkyPark (additional cost) for panoramic city views. Overnight stay at your Comfortable Hotel in Singapore.

itinerary.title: Sentosa Island Tour
itinerary.description: Enjoy a leisurely morning. In the afternoon, get ready for an exciting Sentosa Island Tour. Begin with a scenic Cable Car ride offering spectacular aerial views as you make your way to the island. Explore the incredible S.E.A. Aquarium, one of the largest aquariums in the world, housing over 100,000 marine animals. As dusk falls, witness the mesmerizing Wings of Time night show, a spectacular display of laser, fire, and water effects. Afterward, transfer back to your Comfortable Hotel in Singapore for an overnight stay.

itinerary.title: Universal Studios Singapore
itinerary.description: After breakfast, dedicate your entire day to thrilling adventures at Universal Studios Singapore, located within Resorts World Sentosa. Enjoy full-day access to this world-class theme park, home to seven themed zones and a myriad of rides and attractions. Experience the excitement of rides like Transformers The Ride: The Ultimate 3D Battle, Shrek 4-D Adventure, Jurassic Park Rapids Adventure, and many more. The evening is at your leisure to explore Resorts World Sentosa or simply relax. Overnight stay in Singapore.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: After a delightful breakfast at the hotel, check out and enjoy some free time until your scheduled transfer to Singapore Changi Airport (SIN) for your onward flight, carrying wonderful memories of your 'Soul of Singapore' journey. Price starting from 45K per person.

title: Sail and Explore
description: Embark on an extraordinary 'Sail and Explore' adventure, combining the vibrant cityscapes of Singapore with the luxurious experience of a cruise. This 6-day package offers a perfect blend of urban exploration and nautical leisure. Discover Singapore's iconic landmarks, immerse yourself in the futuristic wonders of Gardens by the Bay, and then set sail on the magnificent Genting Dream Cruise, enjoying world-class amenities, entertainment, and fine dining. Conclude your trip with fun-filled moments on Sentosa Island, ensuring a truly unforgettable journey.
highlights: Explore Singapore's iconic attractions including Merlion Park, Chinatown, and Marina Bay.
Immerse yourself in the stunning flora of Gardens by the Bay, including Cloud Forest and Flower Dome.
Indulge in a luxurious 2-night cruise experience aboard the Genting Dream, enjoying onboard entertainment, dining, and facilities.
Discover the leisure and entertainment hub of Sentosa Island with a scenic Cable Car ride.
Meet your favorite celebrities (in wax) at Madame Tussauds on Sentosa Island.
Witness the spectacular Wings of Time night show, a dazzling display of light, sound, and water.

itinerary.title: Arrival + Leisure
itinerary.description: Upon your arrival at Singapore Changi Airport (SIN), you will be warmly welcomed by our representative and transferred to your comfortable hotel for check-in. The rest of the day is at your leisure to relax and settle in, or you can choose to explore Singapore's renowned shopping districts like Orchard Road, or simply unwind at your hotel. Overnight stay in Singapore.

itinerary.title: Singapore City + Gardens by the Bay
itinerary.description: After breakfast, embark on a captivating half-day guided city tour of Singapore. Drive past and discover key attractions such as Merlion Park, the cultural enclave of Chinatown, the bustling Marina Bay area, and more. In the afternoon, immerse yourself in the breathtaking beauty of Gardens by the Bay, where you'll visit the awe-inspiring Cloud Forest with its towering indoor waterfall and the diverse botanical wonders of the Flower Dome. For an elevated experience, an optional visit to the Marina Bay Sands Observation Deck (additional cost) offers panoramic views of the city. Overnight stay in Singapore.

itinerary.title: Embark on Cruise
itinerary.description: After breakfast, check out from your hotel. You will be transferred to the Marina Bay Cruise Centre. Here, you'll board the magnificent Genting Dream Cruise for a luxurious 2-night itinerary (destination may vary between High Seas or Bintan Island, as per cruise schedule). Once onboard, immerse yourself in the ship's world-class facilities. Enjoy dazzling entertainment shows, take a dip in the infinity pool, savor exquisite fine dining, and participate in various themed onboard events. Overnight onboard the cruise.

itinerary.title: Cruise Fun Day
itinerary.description: Today is a full day to enjoy all the amenities and activities offered on the Genting Dream Cruise. Whether the itinerary takes you to a designated port of call or you spend a glorious day at sea, you'll have ample opportunities for fun and relaxation. Participate in exciting water park activities, indulge in a rejuvenating spa treatment, or be entertained by world-class shows and live performances. Enjoy multiple dining options throughout the day. Overnight onboard the cruise.

itinerary.title: Disembark + Sentosa
itinerary.description: After breakfast onboard, you will disembark the cruise in Singapore at Marina Bay Cruise Centre. Our representative will meet you and transfer you to your hotel for check-in. In the afternoon, prepare for an exciting visit to Sentosa Island. Your Sentosa adventure includes a scenic Cable Car ride offering stunning views of the city and island, entry to Madame Tussauds to pose with your favorite celebrity wax figures, and concluding the day with the spectacular Wings of Time night show, a dazzling display of lights, lasers, and water. Overnight at your Comfortable Hotel in Singapore.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: Enjoy a final breakfast at your hotel. Depending on your flight schedule, you will have some free time until your transfer to Singapore Changi Airport (SIN) for your onward journey, filled with wonderful memories of your 'Sail and Explore' adventure. Price starting from 90K per person.

inclusions: 3 Nights accommodation in a comfortable hotel in Singapore.
2 Nights accommodation onboard Genting Dream Cruise (Inside/Oceanview Stateroom).

title: Cross Borders Getaway
description: Embark on an exciting 'Cross Borders Getaway' that seamlessly blends the futuristic charm of Singapore with the cultural richness of Kuala Lumpur. This 7-day itinerary promises an unforgettable journey across two dynamic Southeast Asian nations. From Singapore's iconic landmarks and thrilling theme parks to Kuala Lumpur's majestic Petronas Twin Towers and vibrant street markets, this package offers a diverse and enriching travel experience.
highlights: Explore Singapore's futuristic Gardens by the Bay and the thrilling Universal Studios.
Witness the stunning architecture of the Petronas Twin Towers in Kuala Lumpur.
Immerse yourself in the cultural diversity of Batu Caves, a significant Hindu shrine.
Experience the vibrant street life and culinary delights of both cities.
Enjoy comfortable transfers and carefully selected accommodations.
Discover the unique blend of tradition and modernity in both Singapore and Kuala Lumpur.

itinerary.title: Arrival in Singapore
itinerary.description: Upon your arrival at Singapore Changi Airport (SIN), you will be met by our representative and transferred to your comfortable hotel for check-in. The evening is free for leisure, allowing you to relax after your journey, or you can opt for an exciting Night Safari (optional, additional cost) – the world's first nocturnal zoo. Overnight stay in Singapore.

itinerary.title: City Tour + Gardens by the Bay
itinerary.description: After breakfast, embark on a captivating half-day Singapore City Tour. Drive past or visit iconic landmarks such as the Merlion Park, the vibrant Marina Bay area, and the cultural charm of Chinatown. In the afternoon, immerse yourself in the futuristic beauty of Gardens by the Bay. Explore the magnificent Cloud Forest with its indoor waterfall and diverse plant life, and the vibrant Flower Dome, showcasing exotic flora from around the world. For an optional breathtaking experience, consider visiting the SkyPark at Marina Bay Sands (additional cost) for panoramic city views. Overnight stay in Singapore.

itinerary.title: Sentosa Day
itinerary.description: After breakfast, get ready for a fun-filled day on Sentosa Island. Your Sentosa adventure includes a scenic Cable Car ride offering spectacular aerial views as you make your way to the island. Explore the incredible S.E.A. Aquarium, one of the largest aquariums in the world, housing over 100,000 marine animals. As dusk falls, witness the mesmerizing Wings of Time night show, a spectacular display of laser, fire, and water effects. Afterward, transfer back to your Comfortable Hotel in Singapore for an overnight stay.

itinerary.title: Singapore to Kuala Lumpur (By Coach or Flight)
itinerary.description: After breakfast, check out from your Singapore hotel. You will be transferred to either the coach terminal or airport for your journey to Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia (duration varies based on chosen mode of transport). Upon arrival in Kuala Lumpur, you will be met and transferred to your hotel for check-in. In the evening, ascend the Kuala Lumpur Tower (KL Tower) for stunning panoramic views of the city skyline, including the iconic Petronas Twin Towers. Overnight stay in Kuala Lumpur.

itinerary.title: Kuala Lumpur City Tour
itinerary.description: After breakfast, embark on a comprehensive Kuala Lumpur City Tour. Highlights include a photo stop at the magnificent Petronas Twin Towers, a visit to the King’s Palace (Istana Negara), the National Mosque, the National Monument, and the historical Independence Square. The evening is free for you to explore the vibrant shopping districts of Pavilion or Bukit Bintang, known for their retail therapy and diverse dining options. Overnight stay in Kuala Lumpur.

itinerary.title: Genting Highlands Excursion
itinerary.description: Today, embark on a full-day excursion to the cool highlands of Genting Highlands. Enjoy a scenic one-way cable car ride (Awana Skyway) offering breathtaking views of the surrounding rainforest. Upon arrival, you can visit the serene Chin Swee Caves Temple or choose to explore the indoor theme park (optional, if open) for some fun and entertainment. Return to Kuala Lumpur in the evening. Overnight stay in Kuala Lumpur.

itinerary.title: Departure from Kuala Lumpur
itinerary.description: After a final breakfast at your hotel, enjoy some free time for last-minute souvenir shopping or relaxation. Depending on your flight schedule, you will be transferred to Kuala Lumpur International Airport (KUL) for your departure, bringing an end to your incredible 'Cross Borders Getaway'. Package starts from 80K per person.

inclusions: 3 Nights accommodation in a comfortable hotel in Singapore.
3 Nights accommodation in a comfortable hotel in Kuala Lumpur.

title: Magical Malaysia
description: Embark on a 'Magical Malaysia' journey, exploring the dynamic capital Kuala Lumpur and its captivating surroundings. This 5-day itinerary offers a perfect blend of modern cityscapes, rich cultural heritage, and refreshing mountain escapes. From the iconic Petronas Twin Towers to the ancient Batu Caves, the historical charm of Malacca, and the cool delights of Genting Highlands, prepare for an enchanting experience in the heart of Southeast Asia.
highlights: Witness the grandeur of the Petronas Twin Towers, an iconic symbol of Malaysia.
Explore the vibrant historical sites of Kuala Lumpur on a comprehensive city tour.
Climb the sacred steps of Batu Caves, a significant Hindu pilgrimage site.
Step back in time with a full-day excursion to the UNESCO World Heritage city of Malacca.
Enjoy the cool climate and scenic cable car ride at Genting Highlands.
Discover the modern architectural marvels of Putrajaya, Malaysia's administrative capital.

itinerary.title: Arrival in Kuala Lumpur
itinerary.description: Upon your arrival at Kuala Lumpur International Airport (KLIA/KLIA2), you will be met by our representative and transferred to your chosen hotel for check-in. In the evening, prepare for an iconic experience with a visit to the Petronas Twin Towers for a photo stop (optional: Skybridge visit for an additional cost). Afterward, take a leisurely stroll along Bukit Bintang, a vibrant district known for its bustling street food scene, entertainment, and lively nightlife. Overnight stay in Kuala Lumpur.
itinerary.accommodation: Comfortable 3★/4★ Hotel in Kuala Lumpur (with breakfast)

itinerary.title: KL City & Batu Caves
itinerary.description: After breakfast, embark on a morning Kuala Lumpur City Tour. Discover historical landmarks such as the Independence Square, admire the Moorish architecture of the Sultan Abdul Samad Building, visit the majestic National Mosque, and make a photo stop at the King’s Palace (Istana Negara). In the afternoon, head to Batu Caves, Malaysia’s iconic Hindu shrine, featuring a towering golden statue of Lord Murugan and a series of cave temples. The evening is free for shopping at world-class malls like Pavilion or Suria KLCC. Overnight in Kuala Lumpur.

itinerary.title: Malacca Day Trip
itinerary.description: Today, enjoy a full-day excursion to the historical city of Malacca, a UNESCO World Heritage site. Explore its rich colonial past with visits to iconic landmarks such as Christ Church, the red-hued Stadthuys, and delve into the vibrant atmosphere of Jonker Street market, known for its antiques, local crafts, and delicious street food. Consider a relaxing river cruise along the Malacca River and admire the picturesque Dutch Square. Return to Kuala Lumpur by evening for an overnight stay.

itinerary.title: Putrajaya & Genting Highlands
itinerary.description: After breakfast, begin your day with morning photo stops in Putrajaya, Malaysia’s modern federal administrative centre, featuring architectural marvels like the Putra Mosque and the Prime Minister’s Office. In the afternoon, embark on a refreshing trip to Genting Highlands, a popular hill resort. Enjoy a scenic cable car ride (Awana Skyway) offering panoramic views of the rainforest. You can visit the serene Chin Swee Caves Temple or explore the indoor theme parks (optional, additional cost) for entertainment. Return to Kuala Lumpur in the evening for your final overnight stay.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: After breakfast and checking out from your hotel, you will be transferred to Kuala Lumpur International Airport (KLIA/KLIA2) for your onward flight, carrying magical memories of your Malaysian adventure. Package starts from 35K per person.

inclusions: 4 Nights accommodation in a comfortable 3★/4★ hotel in Kuala Lumpur.
Daily breakfast at the hotel.

title: Malaysia and Langkawi Bliss
description: Experience the ultimate 'Malaysia and Langkawi Bliss' with this comprehensive 7-day itinerary. This package beautifully combines the bustling city life and cultural richness of Kuala Lumpur with the serene beaches and natural wonders of Langkawi. From iconic skyscrapers and historical sites to thrilling cable car rides and island hopping adventures, prepare for a diverse and unforgettable journey through the heart of Malaysia.
highlights: Witness the grandeur of the Petronas Twin Towers and explore Kuala Lumpur's vibrant city.
Discover the historical charm of UNESCO World Heritage site Malacca.
Enjoy the cool mountain air and scenic views at Genting Highlands.
Soar above the rainforest on the Langkawi SkyCab and walk the iconic SkyBridge.
Relax on Langkawi's pristine beaches and explore its lush natural landscapes.
Experience optional island hopping or water adventures in Langkawi.

itinerary.title: Arrival in Kuala Lumpur
itinerary.description: Upon your arrival at Kuala Lumpur International Airport (KLIA/KLIA2), you will be met by our representative and transferred to your chosen hotel for check-in. In the evening, prepare for an iconic experience with a visit to the Petronas Twin Towers for a photo stop (optional: Skybridge visit for an additional cost). Afterward, take a leisurely stroll along Bukit Bintang, a vibrant district known for its bustling street food scene, entertainment, and lively nightlife. Overnight stay in Kuala Lumpur.

In the afternoon, embark on a refreshing trip to Genting Highlands, a popular hill resort. Enjoy a scenic cable car ride (Awana Skyway) offering panoramic views of the rainforest. You can visit the serene Chin Swee Caves Temple or explore the indoor theme parks (optional, additional cost) for entertainment. Return to Kuala Lumpur in the evening for your final overnight stay in the city.

itinerary.title: Transit to Langkawi & Check-in
itinerary.description: After breakfast, check out from your Kuala Lumpur hotel and transfer to the airport for a short and scenic domestic flight to the tropical paradise of Langkawi (flight duration less than 1 hour). Upon arrival at Langkawi International Airport, you will be transferred to your selected seaside resort for check-in. The afternoon is at your leisure to relax by the beautiful beach, take a dip in the pool, or simply soak in the tranquil island atmosphere. Overnight stay in Langkawi.

itinerary.title: Langkawi Island Tour
itinerary.description: After breakfast, embark on a full-day tour exploring the natural beauty and attractions of Langkawi. Your tour includes a breathtaking ride on the Langkawi SkyCab, taking you up to the majestic SkyBridge for unparalleled panoramic views of the island and Andaman Sea. Visit the serene Seven Wells Waterfall and the iconic Eagle Square (Dataran Lang), a symbol of Langkawi. You'll also see the picturesque rice fields. Enjoy a delicious lunch at a local restaurant. The evening is free for more beach time or an optional romantic sunset cruise (additional cost). Overnight stay in Langkawi.

itinerary.title: Langkawi Water Adventures & Departure
itinerary.description: Enjoy a leisurely breakfast. Today, you have the option to embark on an exciting Island-hopping tour (additional cost), which typically includes visits to pristine islands like Pulau Dayang Bunting (Pregnant Maiden Lake), eagle-watching, and opportunities for swimming and snorkeling. Alternatively, you can spend your time relaxing by the beach or exploring the lively Pantai Cenang area. In the evening, depending on your flight schedule, you will be transferred to Langkawi International Airport for your departure flight or ongoing journey. Package starting from 47K per person.

title: Singapore to Bali Adventure
description: Embark on an enchanting 'Singapore to Bali Adventure', a captivating 8-day journey that combines the futuristic marvels of Singapore with the spiritual serenity and natural beauty of Bali. This dual-destination package offers a perfect blend of bustling cityscapes, thrilling theme parks, lush rice paddies, ancient temples, and stunning beaches. Experience the best of Southeast Asia, from Singapore's iconic landmarks to Bali's tranquil rice terraces and vibrant cultural performances.
highlights: Witness the stunning 'Garden Rhapsody' light show and explore Gardens by the Bay in Singapore.
Experience the thrill of Universal Studios Singapore and Sentosa Island's attractions.
Immerse yourself in Bali's serene spiritual heart in Ubud, including rice terraces and waterfalls.
Witness a breathtaking sunrise at Mount Batur viewpoint (optional).
Discover Bali's iconic temples like Tanah Lot or Uluwatu with spectacular sunset views.
Enjoy leisure time on Bali's beautiful beaches, perfect for relaxation or water activities.

itinerary.title: Arrival in Singapore
itinerary.description: Upon your arrival at Singapore Changi Airport (SIN), you will be met by our representative and transferred to your comfortable hotel for check-in. In the evening, immerse yourself in the futuristic beauty of Gardens by the Bay. Explore the magnificent Supertree Grove and witness the captivating 'Garden Rhapsody' light and sound show, a truly magical experience. Overnight stay in Singapore.

itinerary.title: Singapore City Tour & Sentosa
itinerary.description: After breakfast, embark on a half-day Singapore City Tour. Drive past or visit iconic landmarks such as Merlion Park, the cultural districts of Chinatown and Little India, and take in the impressive skyline from the Marina Bay Sands outlook. In the afternoon, head to Sentosa Island. Enjoy a scenic Cable Car ride to the island, explore the magnificent S.E.A. Aquarium, one of the largest aquariums in the world, and conclude your day with the spectacular Wings of Time night show. Return to your hotel for an overnight stay in Singapore.

itinerary.title: Universal Studios
itinerary.description: After breakfast, prepare for a full day of excitement at Universal Studios Singapore, located within Resorts World Sentosa. Enjoy thrilling rides and attractions across seven themed zones, from the magical world of Shrek to the adventurous Jurassic Park. The evening is free for leisure, or you can opt for an exciting Night Safari (optional, additional cost) – the world's first nocturnal zoo. Overnight stay in Singapore.

itinerary.title: Transfer to Bali (Ubud)
itinerary.description: After breakfast and checking out from your Singapore hotel, you will be transferred to Changi Airport for your morning flight to Denpasar, Bali (DPS). Upon arrival at Ngurah Rai International Airport, Bali, you will be warmly greeted and transferred to your serene private pool villa in Ubud, the cultural heart of Bali. The rest of the day is at leisure to relax, settle into your villa, and soak in the tranquil atmosphere of Ubud. Overnight stay in Ubud.

itinerary.title: Ubud & Countryside Exploration
itinerary.description: Today, immerse yourself in the natural beauty and culture of Ubud. For early risers, an optional sunrise trek to Mount Batur viewpoint offers breathtaking views (additional cost). Experience the thrill of the Bali Swing and explore the iconic emerald-green Tegallalang Rice Terraces. In the afternoon, visit a local coffee plantation to learn about Bali's famous Kopi Luwak and enjoy a tasting. Conclude your day with a refreshing visit to a beautiful waterfall in the Ubud region. Overnight stay in Ubud.

itinerary.title: Beach & Temple Day (South Bali)
itinerary.description: After breakfast, check out from your Ubud villa and transfer to your chosen accommodation in the vibrant beach area of Seminyak/Canggu. After settling in, the afternoon is dedicated to exploring Bali's iconic coastal temples. Visit the majestic Tanah Lot Temple, perched on a rock formation amidst the waves, or head south to Uluwatu Temple, dramatically set on a cliff overlooking the ocean. At Uluwatu, you can opt to witness a mesmerizing Kecak Fire Dance performance (optional, additional cost) against the backdrop of the sunset. Overnight stay in Bali beach area.

itinerary.title: Beach Leisure Day
itinerary.description: Enjoy a full day at leisure to relax and enjoy the vibrant beach atmosphere of Seminyak/Canggu. You can spend your day lounging by the beach, indulging in a rejuvenating Balinese spa treatment, trying out surf lessons (optional), exploring local markets for souvenirs, or simply soaking up the sun. In the evening, enjoy a delightful farewell dinner on the beach, savoring fresh seafood and the sound of the waves. Overnight stay in Bali.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: After breakfast and checking out from your hotel, enjoy some free time until your scheduled transfer to Ngurah Rai International Airport (DPS) for your departure, carrying unforgettable memories of your 'Singapore to Bali Adventure'. Package starts from 75K per person.

inclusions: 3 Nights accommodation in a comfortable hotel in Singapore.

title: Paris to Swiss Alps
description: Embark on an unforgettable 'Paris to Swiss Alps' adventure, a meticulously crafted 8-day journey combining the romantic allure of Paris with the breathtaking natural beauty of the Swiss Alps. This package offers a perfect blend of iconic city landmarks, cultural immersion, and exhilarating mountain experiences. From ascending the Eiffel Tower and exploring Parisian charm to soaring over snow-capped peaks in Switzerland and relaxing by pristine lakes, prepare for a truly diverse and memorable European escape.
highlights: Experience the iconic sights of Paris including the Eiffel Tower, Louvre, Arc de Triomphe, and Champs-Élysées.
Choose between the historical grandeur of Versailles Palace or the magical world of Disneyland Paris.
Enjoy a scenic train journey from the heart of France to the stunning landscapes of Switzerland.
Ascend Mount Titlis via the rotating Rotair cable car, experiencing snow activities and the Cliff Walk.
Explore the picturesque lakeside city of Lucerne and its charming Chapel Bridge.
Take an exhilarating day excursion to the alpine wonderland of Interlaken and Lauterbrunnen Valley.
Option to visit Jungfraujoch – 'Top of Europe' for unparalleled alpine views (optional).

itinerary.title: Arrival in Paris
itinerary.description: Upon your arrival at Charles de Gaulle Airport (CDG), you will be met by our representative and transferred to your comfortable hotel for check-in. The rest of the day is at your leisure to relax and settle in, or you can opt for an enchanting Seine River Cruise in the evening (optional, additional cost) to admire Paris's illuminated monuments. Overnight stay in Paris.

itinerary.title: Eiffel + Louvre + Champs-Élysées
itinerary.description: After breakfast, embark on a captivating exploration of Paris. Ascend to the 2nd level of the Eiffel Tower for breathtaking panoramic views of the city. Enjoy photo stops at iconic landmarks such as the world-renowned Louvre Museum, the majestic Arc de Triomphe, and the historic Notre-Dame Cathedral (outside view). In the afternoon, explore the bohemian charm of Montmartre with its Sacré-Cœur Basilica, or simply relax at a classic Parisian café, soaking in the city's ambiance. Overnight stay in Paris.

itinerary.title: Versailles or Disneyland
itinerary.description: Today, you have the exciting choice of two incredible excursions. You can opt for a historical full-day tour to the opulent Palace of Versailles (entry included), exploring its lavish interiors and magnificent gardens. Alternatively, unleash your inner child with a full-day pass to Disneyland Paris (1 Park entry included). Both options include transfers. Return to Paris in the evening for an overnight stay.

itinerary.title: Paris to Lucerne (Scenic Train)
itinerary.description: After breakfast and check-out, prepare for a picturesque journey from Paris to Switzerland. Enjoy a scenic train ride to Lucerne (approx. 5 hours), passing through charming European landscapes. Upon arrival in Lucerne, you will be transferred to your hotel for check-in. In the evening, take a leisurely stroll along the beautiful shores of Lake Lucerne and admire the iconic Chapel Bridge, one of Switzerland's oldest wooden bridges. Overnight stay in Lucerne.

itinerary.title: Mount Titlis Adventure
itinerary.description: Today, embark on an exhilarating day trip to Mount Titlis, a snow-capped paradise. Experience the world's first rotating cable car, the Rotair, which offers 360-degree panoramic views as you ascend. At the summit, enjoy various snow activities, explore the Glacier Cave, and brave the thrilling Cliff Walk, Europe's highest suspension bridge. Spend ample time enjoying the alpine wonderland before returning to Lucerne for an overnight stay.

itinerary.title: Interlaken & Lauterbrunnen Excursion
itinerary.description: After breakfast, enjoy a full-day excursion to the picturesque Interlaken region, nestled between two stunning lakes. Continue into the breathtaking Lauterbrunnen Valley, known for its 72 waterfalls, including the famous Trümmelbach Falls (optional). You'll have options to explore Interlaken town, enjoy thrilling activities like paragliding (optional, additional cost), visit the panoramic Harder Kulm viewpoint (optional), or simply soak in the magnificent alpine scenery. Return to Lucerne for an overnight stay.

itinerary.title: Free Day / Optional Jungfraujoch
itinerary.description: Today is a free day for you to relax in Lucerne, do some last-minute souvenir shopping, or explore more of the city at your own pace. Alternatively, for an ultimate alpine experience, you can opt for a full-day trip to Jungfraujoch – 'Top of Europe' (optional, additional cost). This journey takes you to the highest railway station in Europe, offering spectacular views of the Aletsch Glacier and the surrounding peaks. Overnight stay in Lucerne.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: After a final breakfast at your hotel, check out and enjoy some free time until your scheduled transfer to Zurich Airport (ZRH) for your return flight, carrying unforgettable memories of your 'Paris to Swiss Alps' adventure. Package starting from 1,50,000 INR per person.

title: Three Cheers to Europe
description: Raise 'Three Cheers to Europe' with this incredible 9-day itinerary spanning three of Europe's most captivating cities: the romantic capital Paris, the charming canals of Amsterdam, and the breathtaking Swiss Alps near Lucerne. This package offers a perfect blend of iconic landmarks, rich culture, and stunning natural beauty. From ascending the Eiffel Tower and cruising Amsterdam's waterways to experiencing the majestic Swiss mountains, prepare for a diverse and unforgettable multi-country European adventure.
highlights: Experience the iconic sights of Paris including the Eiffel Tower, Arc de Triomphe, and Champs-Élysées.
Choose between the magical world of Disneyland Paris or the historical grandeur of the Palace of Versailles.
Discover the unique charm of Amsterdam with a picturesque canal cruise and exploration of its vibrant neighborhoods.
Visit traditional Dutch windmills, cheese farms, and clog-making workshops at Zaanse Schans.
Ascend to the majestic Swiss Alps, with a choice between the snow-capped Mount Titlis or the 'Top of Europe' Jungfraujoch.
Explore the beautiful lakeside city of Lucerne and the adventurous Interlaken region.

itinerary.title: Arrival in Paris
itinerary.description: Upon your arrival at Charles de Gaulle Airport (CDG), you will be met by our representative and transferred to your comfortable hotel for check-in. The evening offers a magical introduction to Paris: you can opt for a delightful Seine River Cruise to admire the city's illuminated monuments or witness the sparkling Eiffel Tower by night from a vantage point. Overnight stay in Paris.

itinerary.title: Paris City Tour
itinerary.description: After breakfast, embark on a comprehensive half-day guided tour of Paris's most famous highlights. Your tour includes a visit to the iconic Eiffel Tower with 2nd level entry, offering breathtaking panoramic views of the city. Drive past and admire the majestic Arc de Triomphe and the glamorous Champs-Élysées. You'll also pass by the famous Louvre Museum (outside visit; entry is optional and additional). The rest of the day is free for leisure, perhaps for some shopping at Galeries Lafayette or exploring the charming Marais district. Overnight stay in Paris.

itinerary.title: Disneyland or Versailles
itinerary.description: Today, you have the exciting choice of two incredible excursions. You can opt for a full day of magic and adventure at Disneyland Paris (1 Park entry included). Alternatively, immerse yourself in royal history with a full-day tour to the opulent Palace of Versailles (entry included), exploring its lavish interiors and magnificent gardens. Both options include transfers. Return to Paris in the evening for an overnight stay.

itinerary.title: Paris to Amsterdam (Train)
itinerary.description: After breakfast and check-out, transfer to the train station for a comfortable high-speed train journey to Amsterdam (approx. 3.5 hours). Upon arrival, transfer to your hotel and check in. In the afternoon, embark on a picturesque Canal Cruise, offering unique perspectives of Amsterdam's charming canals, historic bridges, and gabled houses. Afterward, take a leisurely walk through the charming Jordaan district and the bustling Dam Square. Overnight stay in Amsterdam.

itinerary.title: Amsterdam City Tour & Cultural Experience
itinerary.description: After breakfast, enjoy a captivating city tour of Amsterdam. Visit Zaanse Schans, an open-air museum showcasing traditional Dutch culture, complete with working windmills, a cheese farm where you can sample local cheeses, and a clog-making workshop. In the afternoon, choose between an enriching visit to the Van Gogh Museum to admire his masterpieces, or a fun and interactive experience at the Heineken Experience (entry included for chosen option). In the evening, you may opt for a walk through the famous Red Light District (optional). Overnight stay in Amsterdam.

itinerary.title: Amsterdam to Switzerland (Train/Flight)
itinerary.description: After breakfast and check-out, transfer to the airport or train station for your journey to Switzerland. Depending on your preference and schedule, you will either take a scenic train or a short flight to Zurich or directly to Lucerne. Upon arrival, transfer to your hotel and check in. The evening is at your leisure to relax and enjoy the serene Swiss ambiance. Overnight stay in Lucerne.

itinerary.title: Mount Titlis or Jungfraujoch
itinerary.description: Today, experience a full-day alpine adventure! You have the choice between two majestic Swiss peaks: Mount Titlis or Jungfraujoch – Top of Europe. Mount Titlis offers a rotating cable car, glacier cave, and Cliff Walk. Jungfraujoch, Europe's highest railway station, boasts breathtaking views of the Aletsch Glacier. Both options include transfers and entry tickets. Return to your hotel for an overnight stay in Lucerne.

itinerary.title: Interlaken + Lucerne Tour
itinerary.description: After breakfast, embark on a half-day excursion to the picturesque town of Interlaken, nestled between two stunning lakes and surrounded by mountains. Enjoy some free time for shopping for Swiss souvenirs or a leisurely stroll by the lake. In the afternoon, return to Lucerne and explore the city's charming highlights, including the iconic Chapel Bridge and the poignant Lion Monument. Overnight stay in Lucerne.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: After a final breakfast at your hotel, check out and enjoy some free time until your scheduled transfer to Zurich Airport (ZRH) for your return flight, bringing an end to your incredible 'Three Cheers to Europe' adventure. Package cost for a couple is 1,75,000 INR per person.
