title: Swiss Mini Magic
description: Embark on a 'Swiss Mini Magic' adventure, a compact yet comprehensive 5-day journey through some of Switzerland's most iconic landscapes. This package offers a perfect blend of charming lakeside cities and majestic alpine peaks. From the historical beauty of Lucerne to the adventurous spirit of Interlaken, and exhilarating ascents to Mount Titlis and Jungfraujoch, experience the quintessential Swiss wonders in a short but unforgettable trip.
highlights: Enjoy a scenic train journey from Zurich Airport to the charming city of Lucerne.
Explore Lucerne's iconic Chapel Bridge, Lion Monument, and picturesque Old Town.
Experience the thrill of Mount Titlis with its Rotair cable car, Cliff Walk, and Ice Cave.
Travel to the adventure hub of Interlaken, nestled between two stunning lakes.
Take a relaxing boat ride on Lake Thun or Lake Brienz, surrounded by alpine beauty.
Ascend to Jungfraujoch – 'Top of Europe', the highest railway station in Europe, for unparalleled glacier views.

itinerary.title: Arrival in Lucerne
itinerary.description: Upon your arrival at Zurich Airport (ZRH), embark on a scenic train journey to Lucerne (approx. 1 hour). The train offers beautiful views of the Swiss countryside. Upon arrival in Lucerne, transfer to your hotel and check-in. In the evening, take a leisurely walk to explore Lucerne's charm, including the iconic Chapel Bridge, the poignant Lion Monument, and the quaint Old Town. For a truly magical experience, consider an optional Lake Lucerne sunset cruise (additional cost). Overnight stay in Lucerne.

itinerary.title: Mount Titlis Adventure
itinerary.description: After breakfast, prepare for an exhilarating day trip to Mount Titlis. Travel via Engelberg to the base station, then ascend to the summit using a series of cable cars, including the world's first rotating cable car, the Rotair. At the top, explore the Glacier Cave, brave the thrilling Cliff Walk (Europe's highest suspension bridge), and enjoy various snow activities. Spend ample time soaking in the panoramic alpine views before returning to Lucerne for an overnight stay.

itinerary.title: Transfer to Interlaken + Lake Thun/Brienz
itinerary.description: After breakfast and checking out from your Lucerne hotel, take a picturesque train journey to Interlaken (approx. 2 hours). Upon arrival, transfer to your hotel and check in. In the afternoon, head out to explore the stunning natural beauty surrounding Interlaken. Visit either Lake Thun or Lake Brienz and enjoy a relaxing boat ride on the pristine turquoise waters, surrounded by majestic mountains. For breathtaking panoramic views of the region, consider an optional visit to the Harder Kulm viewpoint (additional cost). Overnight stay in Interlaken.

itinerary.title: Jungfraujoch – Top of Europe
itinerary.description: Today is dedicated to an unforgettable full-day excursion to Jungfraujoch – 'Top of Europe'. Travel via Grindelwald, taking a combination of trains and cogwheel railways through stunning alpine landscapes. At the summit, explore the Glacier Plateau, the enchanting Ice Palace, and the panoramic Sphinx Observatory, offering unparalleled views of the Aletsch Glacier and surrounding peaks. Spend ample time absorbing the magnificent scenery before returning to Interlaken by evening to relax. Overnight stay in Interlaken.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: After a final breakfast at your hotel, check out and enjoy some free time depending on your flight schedule. You will then travel back to Zurich Airport (ZRH) by train for your departure, carrying magical memories of your 'Swiss Mini Magic' adventure. Package starting from 80K per person.

inclusions: 2 Nights accommodation in a comfortable hotel in Lucerne.
2 Nights accommodation in a comfortable hotel in Interlaken.

title: London Calling
description: Answer 'London Calling' with this immersive 5-day itinerary designed to capture the essence of this vibrant capital. From iconic royal landmarks and world-class museums to bustling markets and thrilling entertainment, this package offers a comprehensive exploration of London's rich history, diverse culture, and modern charm. Whether you're a history buff, a Harry Potter fan, or simply looking to soak in the atmosphere of one of the world's greatest cities, this trip promises an unforgettable experience.
highlights: Witness the grandeur of London's royal landmarks including Buckingham Palace, Westminster Abbey, and Big Ben.
Step into history at the Tower of London and marvel at the engineering marvel of Tower Bridge.
Explore world-renowned museums like the British Museum or the Natural History Museum.
Immerse yourself in the eclectic atmosphere of Camden Market or the culinary delights of Borough Market.
Choose between a historical trip to Windsor Castle or a magical journey at Warner Bros. Studio Tour London – The Making of Harry Potter.
Enjoy optional evening activities like a ride on the London Eye or a West End theatre show.

itinerary.title: Arrival in London
itinerary.description: Upon your arrival at London Heathrow (LHR) or Gatwick (LGW) Airport, you will be met by our representative for a private transfer to your comfortable hotel for check-in. The rest of the day is at your leisure to relax and settle in. In the evening, you may opt for a panoramic ride on the iconic London Eye for stunning city views or a leisurely River Thames cruise (optional, additional cost) to see London's landmarks illuminated at night. Overnight stay in London.

itinerary.title: Royal Landmarks & Historical Icons
itinerary.description: After breakfast, embark on a comprehensive guided city tour of London's most famous royal and historical landmarks. Witness the Changing of the Guard (subject to schedule) at Buckingham Palace, admire the magnificent Westminster Abbey, see the iconic Big Ben, and stroll through Trafalgar Square. In the afternoon, delve into history with a visit to the Tower of London, home to the Crown Jewels, and marvel at the impressive Tower Bridge. The evening is free for you to explore the lively areas of Covent Garden or Soho, known for their street performers, shops, and dining options. Overnight stay in London.

itinerary.title: Museum & Market Day
itinerary.description: After breakfast, choose to immerse yourself in culture and history with a visit to a world-renowned museum: either the vast collection of artifacts at the British Museum or the fascinating exhibits at the Natural History Museum. In the afternoon, experience London's vibrant market scene. Stroll through the alternative atmosphere of Camden Market for unique finds and street food, or indulge your senses at Borough Market, a paradise for foodies. In the evening, consider an optional magical experience with a world-class West End theatre show (additional cost). Overnight stay in London.

itinerary.title: Windsor Castle or Warner Bros Studio Tour
itinerary.description: Today, you have an exciting choice for your day trip. You can opt for a half-day trip to the majestic Windsor Castle, the oldest and largest inhabited castle in the world, and an official residence of the King. Alternatively, for Harry Potter fans, embark on a magical journey with the Warner Bros. Studio Tour London – The Making of Harry Potter (pre-booking essential, additional cost for entry if not included in package variant). Both options include transfers. Return to London in the evening for your final overnight stay.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: After a final breakfast at your hotel, check out and enjoy some free time depending on your flight schedule. You will then be provided with a private transfer to London Heathrow (LHR) or Gatwick (LGW) Airport for your departure, carrying unforgettable memories of your 'London Calling' adventure. Package starting from 1,60,000 INR per person.

inclusions: 4 Nights accommodation in a comfortable hotel in London.
Daily breakfast at the hotel.
Return private airport transfers (Heathrow/Gatwick) by car/van.

title: London Charm
description: Uncover the timeless 'London Charm' with this extensive 8-day itinerary, offering a deep dive into the heart of one of the world's most captivating cities. From royal traditions and historical landmarks to world-class museums, vibrant markets, and enchanting parks, this package promises a rich and varied experience. Whether you're a history enthusiast, a culture vulture, or a fan of magical worlds, London offers something for everyone on this comprehensive journey.
highlights: Witness the iconic Changing of the Guard at Buckingham Palace and explore London's royal heritage.
Delve into history at the Tower of London and marvel at the architecture of Tower Bridge.
Enjoy a scenic Thames River Cruise, connecting historical sites along the riverbanks.
Visit the magnificent Windsor Castle, the oldest and largest inhabited castle in the world.
Explore world-renowned museums like the British Museum, Natural History Museum, or Victoria & Albert Museum.
Immerse yourself in London's vibrant markets like Camden or Borough Market.
Option to step into the magical world of Harry Potter at Warner Bros. Studio Tour London.

itinerary.title: Arrival in London
itinerary.description: Upon your arrival at London Heathrow (LHR) or Gatwick (LGW) Airport, you will be met by our representative for a private transfer to your comfortable hotel for check-in. The rest of the day is at your leisure to relax and settle in. In the evening, you may opt for a panoramic ride on the iconic London Eye for stunning city views or a leisurely stroll by the vibrant Southbank, known for its cultural attractions and riverside atmosphere. Overnight stay in London.

itinerary.title: Royal Landmarks & Iconic Streets
itinerary.description: After breakfast, embark on a full-day guided city tour exploring London's most famous royal and historical landmarks. Witness the traditional Changing of the Guard at Buckingham Palace (subject to schedule), admire the architectural grandeur of Westminster Abbey, see the iconic Big Ben and Houses of Parliament, and visit the bustling Trafalgar Square. In the evening, immerse yourself in the vibrant energy of Piccadilly Circus or the lively entertainment district of Soho. Overnight stay in London.

itinerary.title: Tower of London & River Thames
itinerary.description: After breakfast, delve into centuries of history with a visit to the formidable Tower of London, where you can explore its various towers, see the Crown Jewels, and learn about its dramatic past. Afterward, walk across the magnificent Tower Bridge, offering superb views of the city. Then, enjoy a relaxing Thames River Cruise from Westminster to Greenwich, experiencing London from a different perspective. In Greenwich, you can explore the maritime history and consider an optional visit to the Royal Observatory (additional cost) to stand on the Prime Meridian. Overnight stay in London.

itinerary.title: Windsor Castle Day Trip
itinerary.description: After breakfast, embark on a half-day trip to the majestic Windsor Castle, the oldest and largest inhabited castle in the world, and an official residence of the British monarch. Explore the State Apartments, St. George's Chapel, and the beautiful grounds. Return to London in the afternoon. The evening is free for some world-class shopping on Oxford Street or a visit to the iconic Harrods department store in Knightsbridge. Overnight stay in London.

itinerary.title: Museum & Market Trail
itinerary.description: After breakfast, dedicate your morning to London's impressive museum scene. Choose to visit either the vast collection of artifacts at the British Museum, the fascinating natural history exhibits at the Natural History Museum, or the exquisite art and design collections at the Victoria & Albert Museum. In the afternoon, explore one of London's famous markets: the eclectic and lively Camden Market or the gourmet delights of Borough Market. In the evening, consider an optional unforgettable experience with a world-class West End show (additional cost). Overnight stay in London.

itinerary.title: London Parks & Shopping
itinerary.description: After breakfast, enjoy a relaxing morning exploring London's beautiful green spaces. Take a leisurely stroll through Hyde Park or the stunning Regent’s Park. Afterward, wander through the charming streets of Notting Hill with its colorful houses and Portobello Road Market, or soak in the vibrant atmosphere of Covent Garden with its street performers and unique shops. The afternoon is perfect for some last-minute souvenir shopping or revisiting a favorite spot. Overnight stay in London.

itinerary.title: Harry Potter or Leisure Day
itinerary.description: Today offers a magical choice! You can opt for a full-day visit to the incredible Warner Bros. Studio Tour London – The Making of Harry Potter (pre-booking essential, additional cost for entry if not included in package variant), where you can step into the wizarding world. Alternatively, enjoy a leisurely day for personal exploration, revisiting favorite attractions, discovering hidden gems, or simply relaxing. Overnight stay in London.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: After a final breakfast at your hotel, check out and enjoy some free time depending on your flight schedule. You will then be provided with a private transfer to London Heathrow (LHR) or Gatwick (LGW) Airport for your departure, carrying wonderful memories of your 'London Charm' adventure. Package starting from 1,54,000 INR per person.

title: London and Scotland
description: Embark on an epic 'London and Scotland' adventure, a captivating 9-day journey that seamlessly blends the historical grandeur of London with the dramatic landscapes and rich heritage of Scotland. This package offers a diverse experience, from exploring royal palaces and bustling city streets to traversing the mystical Scottish Highlands and searching for legendary monsters. Discover the best of the United Kingdom on this unforgettable multi-city tour.
highlights: Explore London's iconic landmarks including Buckingham Palace, Big Ben, and the Tower of London.
Visit the majestic Windsor Castle, a royal residence steeped in history.
Experience the magic of Warner Bros. Studio Tour London – The Making of Harry Potter (optional).
Enjoy a scenic high-speed train journey from London to the historical capital of Edinburgh.
Discover Edinburgh's majestic Castle, Holyrood Palace, and the Royal Mile.
Embark on a breathtaking journey through the Scottish Highlands, including Glencoe Valley and the legendary Loch Ness.
Visit historic sites like Eilean Donan Castle and Culloden Battlefield in the Highlands.

itinerary.title: Arrival in London
itinerary.description: Upon your arrival at London Heathrow (LHR) or Gatwick (LGW) Airport, you will be met by our representative for a private transfer to your comfortable hotel for check-in. The rest of the day is at your leisure to relax and settle in. In the evening, you may opt for a panoramic ride on the iconic London Eye (optional, additional cost) for stunning city views. Overnight stay in London.

itinerary.title: London City Tour
itinerary.description: After breakfast, embark on a comprehensive guided city tour of London's most famous landmarks. This includes a visit to Buckingham Palace (outside view, witness Change of Guards if scheduled), see the iconic Big Ben and Houses of Parliament, pass by the historic London Bridge, and delve into centuries of history with a visit to the formidable Tower of London. The evening is free to explore London's vibrant West End or enjoy a leisurely dinner. Overnight stay in London.

itinerary.title: Day Trip to Windsor Castle
itinerary.description: After breakfast, enjoy a half-day trip to the magnificent Windsor Castle, the oldest and largest inhabited castle in the world, and an official residence of the King. Explore the State Apartments, St. George's Chapel, and the beautiful grounds. You can also explore the charming town of Eton. Return to London in the afternoon for some evening leisure, perhaps exploring local markets or enjoying a quiet dinner. Overnight stay in London.

itinerary.title: Harry Potter Studio or Leisure + Train to Edinburgh
itinerary.description: After breakfast, you have the morning free. You can choose an optional full-day visit to the incredible Warner Bros. Studio Tour London – The Making of Harry Potter (pre-booking essential, additional cost for entry) for a magical experience, or enjoy free time for shopping or exploring more of London. In the afternoon, transfer to King's Cross Station for a scenic high-speed train journey to Edinburgh (approx. 4.5 hours). Upon arrival, transfer to your hotel and in the evening, enjoy a leisurely walk along the historic Royal Mile. Overnight stay in Edinburgh.

itinerary.title: Discover Edinburgh
itinerary.description: After breakfast, immerse yourself in the rich history and charm of Edinburgh. Visit the iconic Edinburgh Castle, perched atop an ancient volcanic rock, offering panoramic views and historical insights. Explore the grandeur of Holyrood Palace, the official residence of the King in Scotland. For the adventurous, hike up Arthur’s Seat, an extinct volcano, for unparalleled city views. In the evening, consider an optional Whisky Tasting experience or a thrilling Ghost Tour (additional costs). Overnight stay in Edinburgh.

itinerary.title: Road to the Highlands
itinerary.description: After breakfast, embark on a scenic full-day drive into the breathtaking Scottish Highlands. Pass through the dramatic landscapes of Glencoe Valley, renowned for its stunning beauty and historical significance. Continue your journey to the legendary Loch Ness, where you can opt for a cruise (additional cost) to search for its famous monster and explore the ruins of Urquhart Castle. Conclude your day in Inverness or a nearby Highland town. Overnight stay in Inverness or nearby Highland town.

itinerary.title: Highland Adventures
itinerary.description: After breakfast, continue your exploration of the magnificent Scottish Highlands. Visit the picturesque Eilean Donan Castle, one of Scotland's most iconic castles, beautifully set on an island. Delve into Scottish history at Culloden Battlefield, the site of the last pitched battle fought on British soil. Enjoy local scenic walks and discover charming hidden villages, soaking in the raw beauty and tranquility of the Highlands. Overnight stay in the Highlands.

itinerary.title: Return to London (Train or Flight)
itinerary.description: After breakfast and check-out, transfer to Inverness Airport or Edinburgh Airport (depending on your departure preference and flight availability) for your flight or train back to London. Upon arrival in London, you will be transferred to your hotel. An overnight stay in London is optional, depending on your international flight schedule; if your flight is late in the evening on Day 9, you might opt to stay in London. Overnight stay in London (if required, otherwise prepare for immediate departure).

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: After breakfast (if overnighted in London) and checking out from your hotel, you will be provided with a private transfer to London Heathrow (LHR) or Gatwick (LGW) Airport for your departure, carrying unforgettable memories of your 'London and Scotland' adventure. Package starting from 1,70,000 INR per person.

title: Pattaya and Bangkok Gateway
description: Embark on the 'Pattaya and Bangkok Gateway' tour, a compact yet thrilling 4-day adventure through two of Thailand's most vibrant destinations. This package offers a perfect blend of beach relaxation and city excitement, from Pattaya's lively shores and entertainment to Bangkok's glittering temples and bustling markets. Discover the best of Thai culture, natural beauty, and urban delights on this express journey.
highlights: Experience the vibrant nightlife and beautiful beaches of Pattaya.
Enjoy the pristine waters and exciting activities on a Coral Island tour.
Witness the dazzling Alcazar Cabaret Show (optional) in Pattaya.
Explore the renowned Gems Gallery, showcasing exquisite Thai gemstones.
Indulge in a romantic Chao Phraya River Dinner Cruise, offering stunning views of Bangkok's illuminated skyline.
Discover Bangkok's rich cultural heritage with visits to the Golden Buddha and Marble Temple.

itinerary.title: Arrival in Bangkok – Transfer to Pattaya
itinerary.description: Upon your arrival at Bangkok International Airport (BKK), you will be warmly met and greeted by our local representative. From the airport, enjoy a comfortable road transfer to the lively coastal city of Pattaya (approx. 2 hours drive). Upon arrival, check-in at your hotel and take some time to rest and refresh. In the evening, you have the option to attend the dazzling Alcazar Cabaret Show (optional, additional cost), famous for its elaborate costumes and performances. Overnight stay in Pattaya.

itinerary.title: Coral Island Tour
itinerary.description: After breakfast at your hotel, get ready for an exciting Coral Island (Koh Larn) tour by speedboat. Enjoy the crystal-clear waters and white sandy beaches. You'll have the opportunity to partake in various water activities such as parasailing, snorkeling, or riding a banana boat (all water activities are optional and at an additional cost). Enjoy a delicious lunch at a local restaurant on the island. Afterward, return to your hotel in Pattaya. The evening is at your leisure to explore the famous Walking Street or relax along Pattaya Beach Road. Overnight stay in Pattaya.

itinerary.title: Transfer to Bangkok – Gems Gallery & Cruise
itinerary.description: Enjoy breakfast at your hotel and then check out from your Pattaya accommodation. Begin your journey back to Bangkok by road. En route, make a stop at the magnificent Gems Gallery, where you can witness the artistry of Thai jewelry making and learn about precious stones. Upon arrival in Bangkok, check-in at your hotel. In the evening, prepare for a memorable experience with a Chao Phraya River Dinner Cruise. Enjoy a sumptuous buffet dinner, traditional Thai dance performances, and breathtaking views of Bangkok's illuminated landmarks along the river. Overnight stay in Bangkok.

itinerary.title: Bangkok City Tour – Departure
itinerary.description: After breakfast at your hotel, embark on a half-day Bangkok City and Temple Tour. Visit two of Bangkok's most significant temples: the Wat Traimit (Temple of the Golden Buddha), housing a 5.5-ton solid gold Buddha statue, and the exquisite Wat Benchamabophit (Marble Temple), known for its elegant white marble architecture. After the tour, you will be transferred to Bangkok International Airport (BKK) for your return flight, carrying wonderful memories of your 'Pattaya and Bangkok Gateway' adventure. Package cost starting from 20,000 INR for one person.

title: Unwind in Krabi and Phuket
description: Embark on a blissful journey to 'Unwind in Krabi and Phuket', a perfect 5-day escape to Thailand's stunning southern provinces. This package seamlessly blends the vibrant energy of Phuket with the tranquil beauty of Krabi, offering pristine beaches, breathtaking island excursions, and opportunities for relaxation and adventure. Discover the iconic limestone karsts, crystal-clear waters, and lush landscapes that make this region a tropical paradise.
highlights: Relax and explore the famous Patong Beach and vibrant night markets in Phuket.
Experience a full-day Phi Phi Island tour by speedboat, visiting iconic spots like Maya Bay and Viking Cave.
Enjoy snorkeling in the turquoise waters around Phi Phi Islands.
Take a scenic road transfer from the bustling Phuket to the serene Krabi.

Swim and snorkel at stunning locations like Phra Nang Cave Beach, Chicken Island, Tup Island, and Poda Island.

itinerary.title: Phi Phi Island Tour
itinerary.description: After breakfast at your hotel, get ready for an unforgettable full-day Phi Phi Island tour by speedboat. Cruise to some of Thailand's most famous islands, including the stunning Maya Bay (from a distance, due to environmental regulations), Viking Cave, and various pristine snorkeling spots. You'll have ample time to swim, sunbathe, and enjoy the picturesque scenery. A delicious lunch will be served on one of the islands. Afterward, return to Phuket and relax at your hotel. itinerary.title: Transfer to Krabi
itinerary.description: Enjoy breakfast at your hotel and then check-out from your Phuket accommodation. You will then embark on a scenic road transfer to Krabi (approx. 3 hours drive). itinerary.description: After breakfast at your hotel, prepare for an exciting full-day Four Island Tour by traditional long-tail boat. This tour will take you to some of Krabi's most iconic and beautiful islands. You'll visit the stunning Phra Nang Cave Beach with its unique limestone formations, the intriguing Chicken Island (named for its rock shape), Tup Island (famous for its sandbar connecting to Chicken Island at low tide), and the picturesque Poda Island. Experience the thrilling wildlife at Safari World and Marine Park in Bangkok.

Fly to Phuket, Thailand's largest island, and relax on its beautiful beaches.

itinerary.title: Arrival in Bangkok – Transfer to Pattaya
itinerary.description: Upon your arrival at Bangkok International Airport (BKK), you will be warmly met by our local representative and transferred by private car/van to the lively coastal city of Pattaya (approx. 2 hours drive). Upon arrival, check-in at your comfortable hotel and take some time to rest and refresh. In the evening, you have the option to attend the dazzling Alcazar Cabaret Show (optional, additional cost), famous for its elaborate costumes and performances. Overnight stay in Pattaya.

itinerary.title: Coral Island Tour
itinerary.description: After breakfast at your hotel, get ready for an exciting full-day Coral Island (Koh Larn) excursion by speedboat. Enjoy the pristine white sands and crystal-clear waters. You'll have the opportunity to partake in various water activities such as parasailing, snorkeling, or riding a banana boat (all water activities are optional and at an additional cost). A delicious lunch will be served at a local restaurant on the island. Afterward, return to your hotel in Pattaya. The evening is at your leisure to explore the famous Walking Street or relax along Pattaya Beach Road. Overnight stay in Pattaya.

itinerary.title: Bangkok Tour – Fly to Phuket

title: Northern Charm & Southern Shores
description: Experience the ultimate Thai adventure with 'Northern Charm & Southern Shores', an immersive 9-day journey spanning the cultural richness of Chiang Mai, the bustling energy of Bangkok, and the idyllic beaches of Phuket. This package is designed to offer a diverse taste of Thailand, from the misty mountains and ethical elephant encounters of the north to the vibrant city life and stunning island landscapes of the south. Discover ancient temples, bustling markets, thrilling wildlife, and breathtaking natural beauty on this comprehensive tour.
highlights: Explore the cultural capital of Chiang Mai, nestled in the mountainous north.
Visit Doi Inthanon National Park, home to Thailand's highest peak, waterfalls, and tribal villages.
Spend a heartwarming morning at an ethical elephant sanctuary.
Discover the vibrant city of Bangkok, with its iconic temples and bustling markets.
Choose between the exciting Safari World and Marine Park or a shopping spree at MBK Mall in Bangkok.
Relax on the beautiful beaches of Phuket and embark on a thrilling Phi Phi Island tour.
Explore the unique landscapes of Phang Nga Bay and James Bond Island with canoeing through limestone caves.

itinerary.title: Arrival in Chiang Mai
itinerary.description: Upon your arrival at Chiang Mai International Airport (CNX), you will be met by our local representative and transferred to your comfortable hotel for check-in. The rest of the day is at your leisure to relax and settle in. You can take an evening stroll around the Old City moat, explore the night bazaar, or enjoy some authentic Northern Thai cuisine. Overnight stay in Chiang Mai.

itinerary.title: Doi Inthanon National Park
itinerary.description: After breakfast, embark on a full-day excursion to Doi Inthanon National Park, home to Thailand's highest peak. Explore the beautiful natural landscapes, including stunning waterfalls like Wachirathan Waterfall and Sirithan Waterfall. Visit the King and Queen Pagodas, nestled in beautifully landscaped gardens. Discover the unique culture of local hill tribes at a Karen village and enjoy a nature walk along the Ang Ka Nature Trail. Return to Chiang Mai in the evening. Overnight stay in Chiang Mai.

itinerary.title: Elephant Sanctuary – Fly to Bangkok
itinerary.description: After breakfast, spend a heartwarming morning at an ethical Elephant Sanctuary. Learn about these magnificent creatures, participate in preparing their food, feed them, and observe them in their natural habitat (no riding). This experience focuses on conservation and responsible tourism. In the afternoon, transfer to Chiang Mai Airport for your domestic flight to Bangkok. Upon arrival at Bangkok, you will be transferred to your hotel for check-in and leisure. Overnight stay in Bangkok.

itinerary.title: Bangkok Tour
itinerary.description: After breakfast, embark on a full-day Bangkok City and Temple Tour. Visit some of Bangkok's most significant cultural landmarks. Explore the magnificent Wat Pho (Temple of the Reclining Buddha), home to one of the largest reclining Buddha statues. You can also opt for an additional visit to the opulent Grand Palace and the sacred Wat Phra Kaew (Temple of the Emerald Buddha). Stroll through vibrant local markets, experiencing the bustling daily life of Bangkok. Overnight stay in Bangkok.

itinerary.title: Safari World or Shopping – Fly to Phuket
itinerary.description: After breakfast, you have the choice for your day in Bangkok. You can opt for an exciting visit to Safari World and Marine Park (entry included) to enjoy animal shows and diverse wildlife encounters. Alternatively, indulge in some retail therapy at one of Bangkok's famous shopping malls like MBK Center. In the late afternoon, check out from your hotel and transfer to Bangkok Airport for your domestic flight to Phuket. Upon arrival in Phuket, you will be transferred to your hotel for check-in and relaxation. Overnight stay in Phuket.

itinerary.title: Phi Phi Island Tour
itinerary.description: After breakfast at your hotel, get ready for an unforgettable full-day Phi Phi Island tour by speedboat. Cruise to some of Thailand's most famous islands, including the stunning Maya Bay (from a distance, due to environmental regulations), Monkey Beach (where you might spot playful macaques), and various pristine snorkeling spots with vibrant marine life. You'll have ample time to swim, sunbathe, and enjoy the picturesque scenery. A delicious lunch will be served on one of the islands. Afterward, return to Phuket and relax at your hotel. Overnight stay in Phuket.

itinerary.title: James Bond Island Tour
itinerary.description: After breakfast, embark on an exciting full-day excursion to Phang Nga Bay, famously known for James Bond Island (Koh Tapu), featured in 'The Man with the Golden Gun'. Enjoy a scenic long-tail boat ride through the dramatic limestone karsts rising from the emerald waters. You'll have the opportunity to canoe through mystical caves and hidden lagoons. Explore Panyee Island, a fascinating floating Muslim fishing village. A local lunch will be served during the tour. Return to Phuket in the late afternoon. Overnight stay in Phuket.

itinerary.title: Leisure Day
itinerary.description: Enjoy a full day at leisure in Phuket. You can relax on the beautiful beaches, explore the vibrant Patong area, indulge in some last-minute shopping, or pamper yourself with an optional traditional Thai spa treatment (additional cost). This day is designed for you to unwind and enjoy Phuket at your own pace. Overnight stay in Phuket.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: Enjoy your final breakfast at the hotel. Depending on your flight schedule, you will have some free time for leisure. Afterward, you will be transferred to Phuket International Airport (HKT) for your departure, carrying wonderful memories of your 'Northern Charm & Southern Shores' adventure in Thailand. title: Halong Harmony
description: Discover the enchanting 'Halong Harmony' with this delightful 5-day tour, offering a perfect blend of Vietnam's rich history, vibrant culture, and breathtaking natural beauty. Explore the charming capital city of Hanoi, steeped in centuries of tradition, before embarking on an unforgettable overnight cruise through the mystical limestone karsts of Halong Bay, a UNESCO World Heritage Site. This package promises a harmonious balance of urban exploration and serene natural wonders.
highlights: Immerse yourself in the bustling charm of Hanoi's Old Quarter.
Discover Hanoi's historical and cultural landmarks including Ho Chi Minh Mausoleum, One Pillar Pagoda, and Temple of Literature.
Experience the unique art of Vietnamese Water Puppet Show.
Embark on an unforgettable overnight cruise through the stunning Halong Bay, a UNESCO World Heritage Site.
Enjoy delicious meals, engaging activities like kayaking or cave exploration, and breathtaking views onboard your Halong Bay cruise.
Wake up to the serene beauty of Halong Bay with an early morning Tai Chi session.

itinerary.title: Arrival in Hanoi
itinerary.description: Upon your arrival at Noi Bai International Airport (HAN) in Hanoi, you will be warmly met by our local representative and transferred to your comfortable hotel for check-in. The rest of the day is at your leisure to relax and settle in. In the evening, feel free to explore the fascinating Old Quarter on your own, known for its narrow streets, ancient houses, and vibrant street life. Overnight stay in Hanoi.

itinerary.title: Hanoi City Tour
itinerary.description: After breakfast at your hotel, embark on a comprehensive Hanoi City Tour. Visit significant landmarks such as the solemn Ho Chi Minh Mausoleum (outside view, closed on Mondays, Fridays, and in the afternoons), the elegant One Pillar Pagoda, and the tranquil Temple of Literature, Vietnam's first national university. Enjoy a delicious lunch at a local restaurant. In the afternoon, explore the picturesque Hoan Kiem Lake and visit Ngoc Son Temple. In the evening, experience the unique traditional art form of a Water Puppet Show. Overnight stay in Hanoi.

itinerary.title: Halong Bay Overnight Cruise
itinerary.description: After an early breakfast and check-out from your hotel, you will be picked up for a scenic drive to Halong Bay (approx. 3.5 hours drive). Upon arrival at the pier, board your luxurious overnight cruise through this UNESCO World Heritage Site. Enjoy a welcome drink as you set sail through thousands of towering limestone karsts and emerald waters. Savor a delicious lunch on board as you cruise past iconic islets. Engage in optional activities such as kayaking around the grottoes, visiting stunning caves, or simply relaxing on the sundeck. Enjoy a delectable dinner on board. Overnight accommodation on the cruise.

itinerary.title: Cruise & Return to Hanoi
itinerary.description: Start your day with an invigorating Tai Chi session on the sundeck as the sun rises over Halong Bay's magical landscape. Enjoy a light breakfast before exploring more hidden gems of the bay. Afterward, a hearty brunch will be served on board as the cruise sails back to the pier. Upon disembarkation, you will be transferred back to Hanoi. Check-in at your hotel and the rest of the day is free for you to relax or explore Hanoi at your leisure. Overnight stay in Hanoi.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: After breakfast at your hotel, enjoy some free time depending on your flight schedule for last-minute souvenir shopping or a final stroll. Afterward, you will be transferred to Noi Bai International Airport (HAN) for your departure, carrying wonderful memories of your 'Halong Harmony' adventure. Package starts from 32,000 INR per person.

title: Viet Vibes
description: Immerse yourself in the vibrant 'Viet Vibes' with this exciting 6-day tour, connecting the historical charm of Hanoi with the coastal beauty and ancient traditions of Central Vietnam (Da Nang & Hoi An). This package offers a diverse experience, from exploring Hanoi's cultural landmarks and enjoying traditional art to marvelling at Da Nang's modern marvels and wandering through the lantern-lit streets of Hoi An. Discover the unique blend of history, culture, and stunning landscapes that define Vietnam.
highlights: Explore the historical heart of Hanoi, including the Ho Chi Minh Complex and Temple of Literature.
Witness the captivating traditional Vietnamese Water Puppet Show.
Experience the charm of Hoi An Ancient Town, a UNESCO World Heritage Site, with its lantern-lit streets and riverside cafes.
Ascend to the magical Ba Na Hills and walk on the iconic Golden Bridge.
Discover the mystical Marble Mountains and relax on the beautiful My Khe Beach in Da Nang.

itinerary.title: Arrival in Hanoi
itinerary.description: Upon your arrival at Noi Bai International Airport (HAN) in Hanoi, you will be warmly met by our local representative and transferred to your comfortable hotel for check-in. The rest of the day is at your leisure to relax and settle in. In the evening, you can opt for a leisurely walk through the charming French Quarter, admiring its colonial architecture. Overnight stay in Hanoi.

itinerary.title: Hanoi Exploration
itinerary.description: After breakfast at your hotel, embark on a comprehensive Hanoi City Tour. Visit key historical and cultural highlights including the solemn Ho Chi Minh Complex (outside view of Mausoleum, One Pillar Pagoda), and the tranquil Temple of Literature, Vietnam's first national university. Enjoy a leisurely stroll around the picturesque Hoan Kiem Lake and visit Ngoc Son Temple. In the evening, experience the unique traditional art form of a Water Puppet Show. Overnight stay in Hanoi.

itinerary.title: Fly to Da Nang – Hoi An Evening Visit
itinerary.description: After breakfast and check-out from your Hanoi hotel, you will be transferred to Noi Bai Airport for your morning domestic flight to Da Nang. Upon arrival at Da Nang International Airport (DAD), you will be met and transferred to your hotel for check-in and a short rest. In the evening, embark on a guided tour to the enchanting Hoi An Ancient Town, a UNESCO World Heritage Site. Explore its beautifully preserved architecture, stroll through its famous lantern-lit streets, and enjoy the charming atmosphere of its riverside cafes. Overnight stay in Da Nang.

itinerary.title: Ba Na Hills & Golden Bridge
itinerary.description: After breakfast at your hotel, embark on an exciting full-day trip to Ba Na Hills. Ascend by one of the longest cable car systems in the world, offering breathtaking panoramic views. At the summit, marvel at the iconic Golden Bridge (Cau Vang) held by giant stone hands. Explore the charming French Village, enjoy the vibrant gardens, and have fun at Fantasy Park, an indoor entertainment complex. Enjoy lunch at a local restaurant or within Ba Na Hills. Return to Da Nang in the evening. Overnight stay in Da Nang.

itinerary.title: Marble Mountains & My Khe Beach
itinerary.description: After breakfast, your morning will be dedicated to visiting the mystical Marble Mountains, a cluster of five limestone and marble hills. Explore the caves, grottoes, pagodas, and temples carved into the mountains, offering stunning views and a spiritual ambiance. In the afternoon, enjoy leisure time at the beautiful My Khe Beach, renowned for its soft white sand and clear blue waters, perfect for relaxation or a leisurely stroll. Overnight stay in Da Nang.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: After breakfast and check-out from your hotel, enjoy some free time depending on your flight schedule. Afterward, you will be transferred to Da Nang International Airport (DAD) for your departure, carrying wonderful memories of your 'Viet Vibes' adventure. Package starts from 38,000 INR per person.

title: Saigon Circuit
description: Embark on the grand 'Saigon Circuit' tour, an immersive 8-day journey through the captivating highlights of Vietnam. This comprehensive package seamlessly connects the historical charm of Hanoi and the mystical beauty of Halong Bay with the coastal allure of Central Vietnam (Da Nang & Hoi An), culminating in the vibrant energy of Ho Chi Minh City (Saigon). Discover ancient traditions, breathtaking landscapes, and significant historical sites as you traverse this incredible country from north to south.
highlights: Explore the cultural and historical landmarks of Hanoi, including the Ho Chi Minh Complex and Temple of Literature.
Experience a day cruise through the magnificent limestone karsts of Halong Bay, a UNESCO World Heritage Site.
Wander through the enchanting, lantern-lit streets of Hoi An Ancient Town, a UNESCO World Heritage Site.
Visit the impressive Ba Na Hills and walk on the iconic Golden Bridge in Da Nang.
Delve into the historical significance of the Cu Chi Tunnels near Ho Chi Minh City.
Discover the French colonial architecture and vibrant markets of Ho Chi Minh City (Saigon).

The rest of the day is at your leisure to relax and settle in. In the evening, feel free to explore the fascinating Old Quarter on your own, known for its narrow streets, ancient houses, and vibrant street life. Overnight stay in Hanoi.

Visit significant landmarks such as the solemn Ho Chi Minh Mausoleum (outside view, closed on Mondays, Fridays, and in the afternoons), the elegant One Pillar Pagoda, and the tranquil Temple of Literature, Vietnam's first national university. Enjoy a delicious lunch at a local restaurant. Afterward, explore the picturesque Hoan Kiem Lake and visit Ngoc Son Temple. Overnight stay in Hanoi.

itinerary.title: Halong Bay Day Cruise
itinerary.description: After an early breakfast at your hotel, you will be picked up for a scenic drive to Halong Bay (approx. 3.5 hours drive). Upon arrival at the pier, board your day cruise through this UNESCO World Heritage Site. Enjoy a welcome drink and savor a delicious lunch on board as you sail through thousands of towering limestone karsts and emerald waters. You'll have the opportunity to visit a stunning cave and enjoy breathtaking views. In the late afternoon, disembark and transfer back to Hanoi. Overnight stay in Hanoi.

itinerary.title: Fly to Da Nang – Hoi An Tour
itinerary.description: After breakfast and check-out from your Hanoi hotel, you will be transferred to Noi Bai Airport for your morning domestic flight to Da Nang. Upon arrival at Da Nang International Airport (DAD), you will be met and transferred to your hotel for check-in and a short rest. In the evening, embark on a guided tour to the enchanting Hoi An Ancient Town, a UNESCO World Heritage Site. Explore its beautifully preserved architecture, stroll through its famous lantern-lit streets, and enjoy the charming atmosphere of its riverside cafes. Overnight stay in Da Nang.

itinerary.title: Ba Na Hills Tour
itinerary.description: After breakfast at your hotel, embark on an exciting full-day trip to Ba Na Hills. Ascend by one of the longest cable car systems in the world, offering breathtaking panoramic views. At the summit, marvel at the iconic Golden Bridge (Cau Vang) held by giant stone hands. Explore the charming French Village, enjoy the vibrant gardens, and have fun at Fantasy Park, an indoor entertainment complex. Enjoy lunch at a local restaurant or within Ba Na Hills. Return to Da Nang in the evening. Overnight stay in Da Nang.

itinerary.title: Fly to Ho Chi Minh City (Saigon)
itinerary.description: After breakfast and check-out from your Da Nang hotel, you will be transferred to Da Nang International Airport for your domestic flight to Ho Chi Minh City (Saigon). Upon arrival at Tan Son Nhat International Airport (SGN), you will be met and transferred to your hotel for check-in. In the evening, you can explore the bustling Ben Thanh Market, perfect for souvenir shopping and street food adventures. Overnight stay in Ho Chi Minh City.
itinerary.accommodation: Comfortable Hotel in Ho Chi Minh City

itinerary.title: Cu Chi Tunnels & City Tour
itinerary.description: After breakfast, embark on a fascinating morning tour to the Cu Chi Tunnels. Explore the incredible underground network used by Viet Cong soldiers during the Vietnam War, gaining insight into their resilience and ingenuity. Return to Ho Chi Minh City for a local lunch. In the afternoon, embark on a Ho Chi Minh City Tour, visiting iconic landmarks such as the majestic Notre Dame Cathedral, the historic Central Post Office, and the thought-provoking War Remnants Museum. Overnight stay in Ho Chi Minh City.

itinerary.description: After breakfast and check-out from your hotel, enjoy some free time depending on your flight schedule. Afterward, you will be transferred to Tan Son Nhat International Airport (SGN) for your departure, carrying wonderful memories of your 'Saigon Circuit' adventure through Vietnam. Package starting from 45,000 INR per person.

title: Unexplored Vietnam: Hanoi & Sapa
description: Embark on a captivating journey through 'Unexplored Vietnam', a 7-day adventure that takes you from the bustling capital of Hanoi to the tranquil terraced rice fields and ethnic minority villages of Sapa. This package offers a unique blend of cultural immersion, stunning natural landscapes, and thrilling experiences, including a visit to Fansipan, the 'Roof of Indochina'. Discover the authentic beauty and charm of Northern Vietnam on this unforgettable tour.
highlights: Explore the charming Old Quarter and cultural highlights of Hanoi.
Immerse yourself in the vibrant atmosphere and rich history of Vietnam's capital city.
Experience a scenic road journey through the picturesque landscapes of Northern Vietnam to Sapa.
Embark on a full-day trek through stunning rice terraces and traditional villages, interacting with local H'mong and Dao communities.
Ascend to the summit of Mount Fansipan, 'the Roof of Indochina', via a spectacular cable car ride, offering panoramic views.
Enjoy the serene beauty and fresh mountain air of Sapa and its surroundings.

itinerary.title: Arrival in Hanoi
itinerary.description: Upon your arrival at Noi Bai International Airport (HAN) in Hanoi, you will be warmly met by our local representative and transferred to your comfortable hotel for check-in. The rest of the day is at your leisure to relax and settle in. In the evening, feel free to explore the fascinating Old Quarter on your own, known for its narrow streets, ancient houses, and vibrant street life. Overnight stay in Hanoi.

itinerary.title: Hanoi Sightseeing
itinerary.description: After breakfast at your hotel, embark on a full-day Hanoi City Tour. Visit significant landmarks such as the solemn Ho Chi Minh Mausoleum (outside view, closed on Mondays, Fridays, and in the afternoons), the elegant One Pillar Pagoda, the tranquil Temple of Literature, Vietnam's first national university, and the picturesque Hoan Kiem Lake with Ngoc Son Temple. You'll also have time to explore the vibrant local markets. Overnight stay in Hanoi.

itinerary.title: Transfer to Sapa by road
itinerary.description: After an early breakfast and check-out from your Hanoi hotel, you will begin a scenic road transfer to Sapa (approx. 5-6 hours drive). Enjoy the breathtaking views of the northern Vietnamese countryside, with its lush rice paddies and mountains. Upon arrival in Sapa, check-in at your hotel and take some time to relax and soak in the fresh mountain air. The evening is free to explore Sapa town at your leisure. Overnight stay in Sapa.

itinerary.title: Sapa Valley Trek
itinerary.description: After breakfast, embark on a full-day Sapa Valley Trek. This immersive experience will take you through stunning terraced rice fields and to the traditional villages of ethnic minority communities. You will visit Lao Chai Village (home to the Black H'mong) and Ta Van Village (home to the Dzay people). Enjoy interacting with the friendly locals and learning about their unique cultures and daily lives. A local lunch will be provided during the trek. Afterward, trek back to the main road for transfer to your hotel. Overnight stay in Sapa.

itinerary.title: Fansipan by Cable Car
itinerary.description: After breakfast at your hotel, get ready for an unforgettable experience as you visit Mount Fansipan, known as the 'Roof of Indochina'. You will take a spectacular cable car ride up to the summit, enjoying panoramic views of the Hoang Lien Son mountain range and the surrounding valleys. Explore the complex at the top, including pagodas, statues, and observation points. Spend ample time at the summit before descending by cable car. The rest of the afternoon is free for leisure in Sapa. Overnight stay in Sapa.

itinerary.title: Return to Hanoi
itinerary.description: After breakfast and check-out from your Sapa hotel, enjoy another scenic road drive back to Hanoi. Upon arrival in Hanoi, you will be transferred to your hotel for check-in. The evening is free for any last-minute souvenir shopping in the Old Quarter or enjoying a farewell dinner. Overnight stay in Hanoi.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: After breakfast and check-out from your hotel, enjoy some free time depending on your flight schedule. Afterward, you will be transferred to Noi Bai International Airport (HAN) for your departure, carrying wonderful memories of your 'Unexplored Vietnam' adventure. Package starting from 40,000 INR per person.

title: Soulful Korea
description: Embark on a captivating 7-day journey through 'Soulful Korea', an immersive tour designed to showcase the vibrant heart of South Korea – Seoul, along with its charming surrounding attractions. From ancient palaces and traditional villages to thrilling theme parks and solemn historical sites, this package offers a perfect blend of culture, modernity, and entertainment. Discover the unique charm of this East Asian gem, creating unforgettable memories along the way.
highlights: Explore the dynamic cityscape of Seoul, from its traditional markets to modern shopping districts.
Immerse yourself in Korean history and culture with visits to Gyeongbokgung Palace, National Folk Museum, and Bukchon Hanok Village.
Enjoy a serene day trip to the picturesque Nami Island, famous for its natural beauty and K-drama filming locations.
Discover the unique French-inspired cultural village of Petite France.
Gain a profound understanding of Korean history with a visit to the Demilitarized Zone (DMZ).
Experience a full day of thrilling rides and entertainment at Everland, South Korea’s largest theme park.
Admire breathtaking panoramic views from Lotte World Tower and enjoy a relaxing Han River Cruise.

itinerary.title: Arrival in Seoul – Welcome to South Korea
itinerary.description: Upon your arrival at Incheon International Airport (ICN), you will be warmly met and greeted by your CircleTrip representative. Enjoy a comfortable transfer to your accommodation located in popular areas like Myeongdong, Dongdaemun, or Itaewon, known for their vibrant atmosphere. Check-in and take some time to rest and refresh after your journey. In the evening, the rest of the day is at your leisure. You can immerse yourself in the local culture by exploring the bustling street food scene and vibrant shopping lanes around your hotel. Overnight stay in Seoul.
itinerary.accommodation: Comfortable Hotel in Seoul (Myeongdong / Dongdaemun / Itaewon area)

itinerary.title: Full-Day Seoul City Tour
itinerary.description: After breakfast at your hotel, embark on a full-day guided Seoul City Tour. Your cultural exploration begins with a visit to Gyeongbokgung Palace, the grandest of Seoul's five main palaces, where you can witness the captivating Royal Guard Changing Ceremony. Continue to the National Folk Museum to delve deeper into Korean traditional life, followed by a photo stop at Cheongwadae (Blue House), the former presidential residence. Later, stroll through Insadong, a charming district famous for its traditional handicrafts, art galleries, and tea houses, perfect for souvenir shopping. Conclude your cultural immersion by exploring Bukchon Hanok Village, a preserved residential area with traditional Korean houses (hanok). In the evening, enjoy a leisurely walk along the picturesque Cheonggyecheon Stream. Overnight stay in Seoul.

itinerary.title: Day Trip to Nami Island & Petite France
itinerary.description: Enjoy breakfast at your hotel before heading out for a full-day excursion to two enchanting locations. Drive to Nami Island, a half-moon shaped island famous for its beautiful tree-lined pathways, especially popular for its connection to the hit K-drama “Winter Sonata.” Explore the scenic island at your leisure. Afterward, visit Petite France, a unique French-style cultural village with vibrant buildings, museums, and charming cafes, inspired by 'The Little Prince'. Depending on the season and time availability, you might have an optional stop at the tranquil Garden of Morning Calm, known for its stunning themed gardens. Return to Seoul by evening. Overnight stay in Seoul.

itinerary.title: DMZ Tour (Half Day) + Free Afternoon
itinerary.description: After breakfast at your hotel, depart for a solemn yet insightful half-day tour to the DMZ (Demilitarized Zone), a poignant reminder of the Korean War. Your visit will include significant sites such as Imjingak Park, the Freedom Bridge, and the Dora Observatory, offering a glimpse into North Korea. You will also have the option to enter the 3rd Infiltration Tunnel (requires moderate walking through a sloping tunnel, closed on Mondays). Please note: DMZ tours are closed on Mondays. Return to Seoul in the afternoon. The rest of the day is free for your personal leisure – you can indulge in some last-minute shopping, enjoy café hopping, or revisit a favorite spot. Overnight stay in Seoul.

itinerary.title: Everland Theme Park Adventure
itinerary.description: After breakfast at your hotel, get ready for a full-day of excitement and adventure at Everland, South Korea’s largest theme park. This expansive park offers a wide array of attractions, including thrilling roller coasters, the charming Safari World where you can see various animals up close, themed gardens, and exciting K-pop zones. Spend the entire day enjoying the rides, shows, and diverse entertainment options suitable for all ages. Return to your hotel in the evening feeling exhilarated. Overnight stay in Seoul.

itinerary.title: Local Exploration & Han River Cruise
itinerary.description: Enjoy breakfast at your hotel. Today, delve deeper into Seoul's modern marvels and serene beauty. Begin with a visit to Lotte World Tower (Seoul Sky), the 5th tallest building in the world, offering breathtaking panoramic views from its observation deck. Afterward, explore the expansive COEX Mall, a massive underground shopping and entertainment complex, or relax at the stunning Starfield Library. In the late afternoon, embark on a relaxing Han River Cruise, enjoying picturesque skyline views of Seoul. In the evening, you have the optional visit to N Seoul Tower (via cable car, additional cost) for a spectacular night panorama of the city. Overnight stay in Seoul.

itinerary.title: Departure from Seoul
itinerary.description: After breakfast at your hotel and check-out, you will be transferred to Incheon International Airport (ICN) for your departure. Board your flight with beautiful memories of your 'Soulful Korea' adventure. Package starting from 80,000 INR per person.

title: Tokyo Tales: Capital to Culture
description: Embark on 'Tokyo Tales: Capital to Culture', an exhilarating 6-day journey that immerses you in the dynamic fusion of ancient traditions and futuristic innovation across Japan. This package is meticulously crafted to showcase the best of Tokyo's vibrant cityscape, the iconic natural beauty of Mt. Fuji and Hakone, with an optional day trip to the cultural heart of Kyoto. Prepare for an unforgettable adventure filled with historical marvels, breathtaking landscapes, and unique cultural experiences.
highlights: Immerse yourself in the bustling districts of Shinjuku or Shibuya upon arrival in Tokyo.
Discover Tokyo's rich history and culture with visits to Meiji Shrine, Imperial Palace, and Senso-ji Temple.
Enjoy panoramic city views from Tokyo Skytree or Tokyo Tower.
Embark on a scenic day trip to the iconic Mt. Fuji and the picturesque Hakone region.
Experience the beauty of Lake Ashi with a relaxing cruise and enjoy volcanic views from Hakone Ropeway.
Explore modern Tokyo's innovative side at TeamLab Planets or Miraikan Museum, and witness the iconic Shibuya Crossing.
Option to visit Kyoto's UNESCO World Heritage Sites like Fushimi Inari Shrine and Kinkaku-ji (Golden Pavilion) via bullet train.

itinerary.title: Arrival in Tokyo
itinerary.description: Upon your arrival at Haneda (HND) or Narita (NRT) International Airport, you will be warmly met and greeted by our local representative. Enjoy a comfortable transfer to your accommodation located in the vibrant Shinjuku or Shibuya district, known for their bustling streets, entertainment, and dining options. Check-in to your hotel and take some time to rest after your journey. In the evening, the rest of the day is at your leisure – you can stroll through the atmospheric Omoide Yokocho (Memory Lane) for traditional izakaya experience or explore the quirky fashion hub of Takeshita Street in Harajuku. Overnight stay in Tokyo.

itinerary.title: Tokyo Full-Day City Tour
itinerary.description: After breakfast at your hotel, embark on a full-day guided Tokyo City Tour. Begin with a visit to the serene Meiji Jingu Shrine, dedicated to Emperor Meiji and Empress Shoken, followed by a photo stop at the Imperial Palace East Garden (the former site of Edo Castle). Immerse yourself in the traditional atmosphere of the Asakusa district, visiting the ancient Senso-ji Temple, Tokyo's oldest temple, and Browse the Nakamise-dori market. Ascend either the Tokyo Skytree or Tokyo Tower for breathtaking panoramic city views. Conclude your day exploring Ginza, Tokyo's premier luxury shopping and entertainment district. Overnight stay in Tokyo.

itinerary.title: Day Trip to Mt. Fuji & Hakone
itinerary.description: After breakfast, depart early for a scenic full-day excursion to the iconic Mt. Fuji and the picturesque Hakone region. Drive to Mt. Fuji 5th Station (weather permitting, otherwise an alternative view point will be visited) for stunning views of Japan's highest peak. Afterward, enjoy a relaxing cruise on Lake Ashi, surrounded by beautiful scenery. Then, take the Hakone Ropeway for aerial views, including glimpses of the volcanic activity in Owakudani Valley (weather permitting). Return to Tokyo by evening. Overnight stay in Tokyo.

itinerary.title: Explore Modern Tokyo
itinerary.description: After breakfast, dedicate your day to exploring modern Tokyo's innovative and vibrant side. Visit either TeamLab Planets (an immersive digital art museum) or Miraikan (National Museum of Emerging Science and Innovation) to experience futuristic technology and art. Afterward, witness the famous Shibuya Crossing, one of the busiest intersections in the world, and explore the trendy shops and cafes in the area. Take a relaxing stroll through the beautiful Shinjuku Gyoen National Garden. In the evening, you have the option to add a unique Japanese cultural experience such as a Sumo Wrestling demonstration or a Samurai show (optional, additional cost). Overnight stay in Tokyo.

itinerary.title: Optional Kyoto Day Trip or Free Day
itinerary.description: After breakfast, today offers a choice of experiences. You can opt for an optional full-day trip to Kyoto (additional cost) via Japan's efficient bullet train (Shinkansen). In Kyoto, visit the iconic Fushimi Inari Shrine with its thousands of red torii gates, and the exquisite Kinkaku-ji (Golden Pavilion). Explore the traditional geisha district of Gion. Return to Tokyo by evening. Alternatively, enjoy a free day in Tokyo to pursue your interests. You could visit Ueno Park (home to museums and a zoo), or enjoy a fun-filled day at Tokyo DisneySea or Disneyland (tickets and transfers not included). Overnight stay in Tokyo.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: After breakfast at your hotel and check-out, you will be transferred to Haneda (HND) or Narita (NRT) International Airport for your return flight. Depart with cherished memories of your 'Tokyo Tales: Capital to Culture' adventure in Japan. Package starting from 1,05,000 INR per person.

inclusions: 5 Nights accommodation in a comfortable hotel in Tokyo (Shinjuku/Shibuya district or similar).
Daily breakfast at the hotel.
Return airport transfers (Haneda/Narita International Airport) by shared shuttle (Limousine Bus or Airport Limousine).

Full-day Tokyo City Tour (shared basis) including Meiji Shrine, Imperial Palace (East Garden), Asakusa (Senso-ji Temple & Nakamise-dori), and choice of Tokyo Skytree or Tokyo Tower (entrance included). English-speaking guide and transfers included.

Full-day Mt. Fuji & Hakone tour (shared basis) including Mt. Fuji 5th Station (weather permitting), Lake Ashi cruise, Hakone Ropeway, and Owakudani Valley. English-speaking guide, entrance fees, and transfers included. Lunch included.
Entrance to TeamLab Planets OR Miraikan Museum (as per choice) with shared transfers.
All applicable taxes and service charges.
exclusions: International airfare to and from Japan.
Japan Visa fees (if applicable).
Meals not specified in the itinerary (except where mentioned).
Optional activities such as Sumo/Samurai experience, Kyoto Day Trip (bullet train tickets, tours, and entrance fees for Kyoto), DisneySea/Disneyland tickets.
Personal expenses such as laundry, telephone calls, tips for guides/drivers, etc.
Travel insurance.

title: Explore Japan: The Grand Journey
description: Embark on 'Explore Japan: The Grand Journey', an unparalleled 10-day adventure that takes you through the very essence of Japan, from its modern marvels to its ancient traditions and poignant history. This comprehensive package seamlessly connects the bustling energy of Tokyo, the serene beauty of Mt. Fuji and Hakone, the cultural heart of Kyoto and Nara, and the vibrant city of Osaka, with a significant day trip to Hiroshima and Miyajima. Experience iconic landmarks, breathtaking landscapes, and deep cultural immersion on this ultimate Japanese exploration.
highlights: Immerse yourself in the futuristic and traditional delights of Tokyo, from serene shrines to vibrant pop culture districts.
Witness the majestic beauty of Mt. Fuji and the picturesque Hakone region with a scenic cruise and ropeway ride.
Experience the speed and efficiency of Japan's iconic Shinkansen (Bullet Train).
Delve into the rich history and cultural heritage of Kyoto, visiting UNESCO World Heritage Sites like Kiyomizu-dera and Kinkaku-ji.
Encounter friendly deer and ancient temples during a charming day trip to Nara.
Explore the lively city of Osaka, known for its historic castle, vibrant Dotonbori district, and incredible food scene.
Undertake a poignant day trip to Hiroshima's Peace Memorial Park and the beautiful Itsukushima Shrine on Miyajima Island, with its iconic 'floating' torii gate.

itinerary.title: Arrival in Tokyo
itinerary.description: Upon your arrival at Haneda (HND) or Narita (NRT) International Airport, you will be warmly met and greeted by our local representative. Enjoy a comfortable transfer to your accommodation located in the bustling districts of Shinjuku or Ginza, known for their vibrant atmosphere, shopping, and dining options. Check-in to your hotel and take some time to rest after your journey. In the evening, the rest of the day is at your leisure – you can explore the local neighborhood, enjoy a delicious Japanese dinner, or simply relax. Overnight stay in Tokyo.

itinerary.title: Tokyo Heritage & Pop Culture Tour
itinerary.description: After breakfast at your hotel, embark on a full-day guided Tokyo City Tour. Begin with a visit to the serene Meiji Jingu Shrine, dedicated to Emperor Meiji and Empress Shoken. Explore the traditional atmosphere of the Asakusa district, visiting the ancient Senso-ji Temple, Tokyo's oldest temple, and Browse the Nakamise-dori market. Pass by the Imperial Palace East Garden. In the afternoon, dive into Tokyo's pop culture at Harajuku, famous for its unique street fashion, and Akihabara, a haven for anime, manga, and gaming enthusiasts. Conclude your day with panoramic city views from either Tokyo Tower or Tokyo Skytree. Overnight stay in Tokyo.

itinerary.title: Mt. Fuji & Hakone Excursion
itinerary.description: After breakfast, depart early for a scenic full-day excursion to the iconic Mt. Fuji and the picturesque Hakone region. Drive to Mt. Fuji 5th Station (weather permitting, otherwise an alternative view point will be visited) for stunning views of Japan's highest peak. Afterward, enjoy a relaxing cruise on Lake Ashi, surrounded by beautiful scenery. Then, take the Hakone Ropeway for aerial views, including glimpses of the volcanic activity in Owakudani Valley (weather permitting). You'll also visit the Hakone Open-Air Museum, showcasing modern sculptures against a natural backdrop. Return to Tokyo by evening. Overnight stay in Tokyo.

itinerary.title: Tokyo to Kyoto (Bullet Train)
itinerary.description: After breakfast and check-out from your Tokyo hotel, experience Japan's renowned efficiency as you board the Shinkansen (Bullet Train) for your journey to Kyoto, the ancient capital. Upon arrival, transfer to your hotel and check-in. In the afternoon, begin your Kyoto exploration with a visit to the magnificent Kiyomizu-dera Temple, a UNESCO World Heritage Site with a stunning wooden stage offering panoramic city views. Stroll through the charming, traditional streets of Ninenzaka and Sannenzaka below the temple. In the evening, you have the option to witness a traditional Geisha show in the historic Gion District (optional, additional cost). Overnight stay in Kyoto.

itinerary.title: Arashiyama & Golden Temple
itinerary.description: After breakfast, your day in Kyoto continues with a visit to the tranquil Arashiyama district. Enjoy a serene morning walk through the ethereal Arashiyama Bamboo Grove, a truly iconic sight. Explore the beautiful Tenryu-ji Temple, another UNESCO World Heritage Site, and admire the views from the Togetsukyo Bridge. In the afternoon, visit the exquisite Kinkaku-ji (Golden Pavilion), a stunning Zen temple covered in gold leaf, set against a beautiful garden and pond. Overnight stay in Kyoto.

itinerary.title: Day Trip to Nara
itinerary.description: After breakfast, embark on a delightful day trip to Nara, Japan's first permanent capital, known for its friendly wild deer. Visit Todaiji Temple, home to a massive bronze Buddha statue and one of the world's largest wooden buildings. Explore Nara Deer Park, where hundreds of free-roaming deer will greet you. Conclude your visit at Kasuga Taisha Shrine, famous for its many bronze and stone lanterns. Return to Kyoto by evening. Overnight stay in Kyoto.

itinerary.title: Kyoto to Osaka
itinerary.description: After breakfast and check-out from your Kyoto hotel, travel to Osaka, Japan's vibrant culinary and commercial hub. Upon arrival, transfer to your hotel and check-in. In the afternoon, begin exploring Osaka with a visit to the majestic Osaka Castle, a symbol of the city's rich history. Immerse yourself in the lively atmosphere of Dotonbori Street, famous for its dazzling neon lights, entertainment, and incredible street food. Explore the bustling Kuromon Market, known as 'Osaka's Kitchen'. In the evening, enjoy panoramic night views from the Umeda Sky Building. Overnight stay in Osaka.

itinerary.title: Hiroshima & Miyajima Island Day Trip
itinerary.description: After breakfast, embark on a significant full-day trip by bullet train to Hiroshima. Upon arrival, visit the poignant Peace Memorial Park and Museum and the iconic Atomic Bomb Dome, powerful reminders of the city's past. Afterward, take a short ferry ride to Miyajima Island, a UNESCO World Heritage Site, famous for the magnificent Itsukushima Shrine and its 'floating' torii gate (appears to float at high tide). Explore the island and its natural beauty. Return to Osaka in the evening. Overnight stay in Osaka.

itinerary.title: Free Day in Osaka
itinerary.description: Enjoy a full day at leisure in Osaka. This is your chance to explore the city at your own pace. You can indulge in some extensive shopping in the Shinsaibashi district, known for its trendy boutiques and department stores. Alternatively, for a day of thrilling entertainment, you have the option to visit Universal Studios Japan (tickets not included, additional cost). In the evening, enjoy a farewell dinner at a local restaurant, savoring Osaka's renowned cuisine. Overnight stay in Osaka.

itinerary.title: Departure from Osaka
itinerary.description: After breakfast at your hotel and check-out, you will be transferred to Kansai International Airport (KIX) for your return flight. Depart with unforgettable memories of your grand 'Explore Japan' journey. Package starting from 1,30,000 INR per person.

inclusions: 3 Nights accommodation in a comfortable hotel in Tokyo (Shinjuku/Ginza or similar).
3 Nights accommodation in a comfortable hotel in Kyoto.
3 Nights accommodation in a comfortable hotel in Osaka.
Daily breakfast at the hotels.
Return airport transfers (Tokyo: Haneda/Narita; Osaka: Kansai) by shared shuttle (Limousine Bus or Airport Limousine).

Full-day Tokyo City Tour (shared basis) including Meiji Shrine, Imperial Palace East Garden, Asakusa (Senso-ji Temple & Nakamise-dori), Harajuku, Akihabara, and choice of Tokyo Tower or Tokyo Skytree (entrance included). English-speaking guide and transfers included.

Full-day Mt. Fuji & Hakone tour (shared basis) including Mt. Fuji 5th Station (weather permitting), Lake Ashi cruise, Hakone Ropeway, Owakudani Valley, and Hakone Open-Air Museum. English-speaking guide, entrance fees, and transfers included. Lunch included.
One-way Shinkansen (Bullet Train) ticket from Tokyo to Kyoto (economy class, reserved seat).

Full-day Kyoto City Tour (shared basis) including Kiyomizu-dera Temple, Ninenzaka-Sannenzaka streets, Arashiyama Bamboo Grove, Tenryu-ji Temple, Togetsukyo Bridge, and Kinkaku-ji (Golden Pavilion). English-speaking guide, entrance fees, and transfers included.
Full-day Nara Day Trip (shared basis) including Todaiji Temple, Nara Deer Park, and Kasuga Taisha Shrine. English-speaking guide, entrance fees, and transfers included.
One-way train ticket from Kyoto to Osaka (local train).
Osaka City Tour (shared basis) including Osaka Castle (outside view), Dotonbori Street, Kuromon Market, and Umeda Sky Building (entrance included). English-speaking guide and transfers included.

Full-day Hiroshima & Miyajima Island Day Trip (shared basis) by Bullet Train (Osaka-Hiroshima-Osaka) including Peace Memorial Park, Atomic Bomb Dome, and Itsukushima Shrine. English-speaking guide, transport (train, ferry), and entrance fees included.
All applicable taxes and service charges.
exclusions: International airfare to Japan (Tokyo) and from Japan (Osaka).
Japan Visa fees (if applicable).
Meals not specified in the itinerary (except where mentioned).
Optional activities such as Geisha show, Universal Studios Japan tickets, specific water activities, etc.
Personal expenses such as laundry, telephone calls, tips for guides/drivers, etc.
Travel insurance.

title: Kashmir Heaven
description: Embark on an enchanting 5-day journey through 'Kashmir Heaven', a meticulously crafted tour designed to immerse you in the unparalleled beauty of India's 'Paradise on Earth'. This package covers the iconic destinations of Srinagar, Gulmarg, Pahalgam, and an optional excursion to Sonmarg, offering a blend of serene landscapes, thrilling adventures, and rich cultural experiences. Discover the tranquil Dal Lake, snow-capped peaks, lush valleys, and vibrant local life that make Kashmir a truly unforgettable destination.
highlights: Experience the tranquility of Srinagar with a traditional Shikara ride on Dal Lake.
Explore the vibrant local markets of Srinagar, including Lal Chowk and Boulevard Road.
Enjoy a full-day excursion to Gulmarg, known for its stunning meadows and the world-famous Gondola ride.
Discover the picturesque 'Valley of Shepherds' – Pahalgam, with its lush greenery and serene riverside.
Visit historical sites like Saffron fields and Awantipura ruins en route to Pahalgam.
Option to visit Sonmarg, the 'Meadow of Gold', famous for the Thajiwas Glacier and breathtaking views.

itinerary.title: Arrival in Srinagar – The Paradise Begins
itinerary.description: Upon your arrival at Srinagar Airport (SXR), you will be warmly met and greeted by your CircleTrip representative. Enjoy a comfortable transfer to your pre-booked hotel or traditional houseboat on Dal Lake. Check-in and take some time to refresh. In the afternoon, immerse yourself in the serene beauty of Srinagar with a delightful Shikara ride on the iconic Dal Lake, gliding past floating gardens and houseboats. In the evening, you can explore the bustling local markets such as Lal Chowk and Boulevard Road, perfect for souvenir shopping and experiencing local life. Overnight stay in Srinagar.
itinerary.accommodation: Comfortable Hotel or Houseboat in Srinagar

itinerary.title: Excursion to Gulmarg
itinerary.description: After breakfast at your accommodation, embark on a full-day excursion to Gulmarg, often referred to as the 'Meadow of Flowers' (approx. 2 hours drive from Srinagar). Gulmarg is renowned for its lush green meadows in summer and pristine snow-covered landscapes in winter, making it a popular skiing destination. You have the option to experience the famous Gulmarg Gondola Ride (cable car) to Phase 1 (Kungdoor) and Phase 2 (Apharwat Peak) offering breathtaking panoramic views of the Himalayas (tickets for Gondola ride are on direct payment basis). During winter, enjoy snow activities like skiing or snowboarding; in summer, take leisurely walks amidst the beautiful scenery. Return to Srinagar by evening. Overnight stay in Srinagar.
itinerary.accommodation: Comfortable Hotel or Houseboat in Srinagar

itinerary.title: Pahalgam – The Valley of Shepherds
itinerary.description: After breakfast and check-out from your Srinagar accommodation, embark on a picturesque drive to Pahalgam, known as the 'Valley of Shepherds' (approx. 2.5-3 hours drive). En route, you will have the opportunity to visit the fragrant Saffron fields (seasonal) and the ancient ruins of Awantipura Temple, showcasing historical architecture. Upon arrival in Pahalgam, check-in to your hotel. In the afternoon, explore the stunning beauty of Pahalgam. You can enjoy pony rides (optional, on direct payment) to scenic spots like Baisaran Valley (Mini Switzerland) or the beautiful Aru Valley and Chandanwari, surrounded by lush meadows and towering pines. Overnight accommodation in Pahalgam.

itinerary.title: Sonmarg Excursion (Optional) / Leisure Day in Pahalgam & Return to Srinagar
itinerary.description: After breakfast, you have two options for your day: Option 1: Day trip to Sonmarg. Embark on an optional full-day excursion to Sonmarg, the 'Meadow of Gold' (approx. 2.5 hours one way from Pahalgam). Sonmarg is famous for its breathtaking views of the Himalayas and the stunning Thajiwas Glacier. You can enjoy various activities here (optional, direct payment) like pony rides or simply soak in the majestic scenery. Option 2: Leisure day in Pahalgam. Spend your day relaxing in Pahalgam, exploring local cafes, or taking serene walks by the Lidder River. In the late afternoon, regardless of your choice, you will be transferred back to Srinagar. Check-in to your hotel in Srinagar. Overnight stay in Srinagar.
itinerary.accommodation: Comfortable Hotel or Houseboat in Srinagar

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: After breakfast at your accommodation and check-out, you will be transferred to Srinagar Airport (SXR) for your return flight. Depart with cherished and unforgettable memories of your 'Kashmir Heaven' adventure. Package starting from 20,000 INR per person.

inclusions: 2 Nights accommodation in a comfortable hotel or houseboat in Srinagar.
1 Night accommodation in a comfortable hotel in Pahalgam.
1 Night accommodation in a comfortable hotel or houseboat in Srinagar.
Daily breakfast at the hotels/houseboat.
All transfers and sightseeing by private car/cab (as per itinerary, for up to 4 PAX).

Visit to Saffron fields and Awantipura ruins en route to Pahalgam.
