title: Andaman Island Affair: Beaches, History & Watersports
description: Embark on an unforgettable 'Andaman Island Affair', a captivating 5-day journey to the pristine islands of Andaman & Nicobar. This package offers a perfect blend of history, stunning natural beauty, and thrilling water activities. Explore the colonial past of Port Blair, unwind on the world-famous beaches of Havelock Island, and immerse yourself in the vibrant marine life of the Andaman Sea. Get ready for a tropical escape like no other.
highlights: Explore the historic Cellular Jail in Port Blair and witness the poignant Sound & Light Show.
Experience a comfortable ferry ride to the breathtaking Havelock Island (now Swaraj Dweep).
Relax and soak in the beauty of Radhanagar Beach, often ranked among Asia's best beaches.
Enjoy leisure time on Havelock Island with optional thrilling water activities like Scuba Diving, Snorkeling, or Sea Walk.
Visit the picturesque Kalapathar Beach for its unique black rocks and serene ambiance.
Discover Corbyn’s Cove Beach in Port Blair, perfect for relaxation and water sports.
Explore local markets in Port Blair for souvenirs and handicrafts.
Optional visits to significant museums like the Anthropological Museum or Samudrika Naval Marine Museum to learn about the island's culture and marine life.

itinerary.title: Arrival at Port Blair – Cellular Jail & Light Show
itinerary.description: Upon your arrival at Veer Savarkar International Airport (IXZ), Port Blair, you will be warmly greeted by our representative. Transfer to your pre-booked hotel and complete the check-in formalities. After a brief rest, embark on a profound journey through history with a visit to the iconic Cellular Jail, a colonial prison used by the British to incarcerate political prisoners. In the evening, witness the moving Sound & Light Show at Cellular Jail, bringing to life the heroic saga of the Indian freedom struggle. Overnight stay in Port Blair.

itinerary.title: Port Blair to Havelock Island – Radhanagar Beach
itinerary.description: After an early breakfast and check-out from your Port Blair hotel, you will be transferred to the jetty to board a high-speed ferry to Havelock Island (now officially known as Swaraj Dweep), a journey of approximately 2 hours. Upon arrival at Havelock, you will be met and transferred to your Havelock resort. After check-in and refreshing, proceed to the world-famous Radhanagar Beach (Beach No. 7), consistently ranked among the best beaches in Asia. Spend your afternoon relaxing, swimming, and enjoying the pristine white sands and turquoise waters. Witness a breathtaking sunset by the beach. Overnight stay in Havelock Island.

itinerary.title: Havelock Island – Optional Water Activities
itinerary.description: After breakfast at your Havelock resort, the day is at your leisure to enjoy the island. You have the option to partake in various thrilling water activities (on direct payment): opt for Scuba Diving to explore the vibrant coral reefs and marine life, go Snorkeling in the clear waters, or experience the unique Sea Walk for an underwater stroll. Alternatively, you can visit the serene Kalapathar Beach, known for its unique black rocks and calm atmosphere, or simply relax at your resort. Overnight stay in Havelock Island.

itinerary.title: Return to Port Blair – Shopping & Local Exploration
itinerary.description: After breakfast and check-out from your Havelock resort, you will be transferred to the jetty to board a high-speed ferry back to Port Blair. Upon arrival in Port Blair, you will be transferred to your hotel for check-in. In the afternoon, visit Corbyn’s Cove Beach, a picturesque coconut palm fringed beach ideal for relaxing or taking a dip. Later, explore the local shopping markets of Port Blair, perfect for picking up souvenirs like shell crafts, local artifacts, and tribal masks. You also have the optional choice to visit the Anthropological Museum (showcasing tribal life) or the Samudrika Naval Marine Museum (displaying marine life and geology) to learn more about the islands. Overnight stay in Port Blair.

itinerary.title: Departure from Port Blair
itinerary.description: After breakfast at your hotel and check-out, you will be transferred to Veer Savarkar International Airport (IXZ), Port Blair, for your onward journey. Depart with unforgettable island memories of your 'Andaman Island Affair'. Package starting from 30,000 INR per person.

title: Andaman & Nicobar Expedition: Islands, History & Adventure

This package offers an immersive experience, combining historical insights in Port Blair, the pristine beauty and adventure of Havelock Island, and the tranquil charm of Neil Island. Discover magnificent beaches, vibrant marine life, colonial ruins, and thrilling water sports, creating memories that will last a lifetime in this tropical paradise.
highlights: Explore the historical Cellular Jail and witness the poignant Sound & Light Show in Port Blair.
Visit iconic landmarks in Port Blair including Corbyn’s Cove Beach and Flag Point.
Experience the pristine beauty of Havelock Island (Swaraj Dweep), home to the world-renowned Radhanagar Beach.
Indulge in thrilling optional water activities on Havelock Island like Scuba Diving, Snorkeling, or Sea Walk.
Discover the tranquil charm of Neil Island (Shaheed Dweep) with its unique Natural Rock Bridge and beautiful beaches like Laxmanpur and Bharatpur.
Explore the historical ruins and lush deer park of Ross Island (Netaji Subhash Chandra Bose Dweep).
Engage in exhilarating water sports and admire coral reefs at North Bay Island.
Enjoy the convenience of seamless ferry transfers between the islands.

itinerary.title: Arrival at Port Blair – City Tour
itinerary.description: Upon your arrival at Veer Savarkar International Airport (IXZ), Port Blair, you will be warmly greeted by our representative. Transfer to your pre-booked hotel and complete the check-in formalities. After a brief rest, embark on a profound journey through history with a visit to the iconic Cellular Jail, a colonial prison. Explore Corbyn’s Cove Beach, a picturesque coconut palm-fringed beach, ideal for relaxing. Visit Flag Point, significant for India's history. In the evening, witness the moving Sound & Light Show at Cellular Jail, bringing to life the heroic saga of the Indian freedom struggle. Overnight stay in Port Blair.

itinerary.title: Port Blair to Havelock Island – Radhanagar Beach
itinerary.description: After an early breakfast and check-out from your Port Blair hotel, you will be transferred to the jetty to board a high-speed ferry to Havelock Island (now officially known as Swaraj Dweep), a journey of approximately 2 hours. Upon arrival at Havelock, you will be met and transferred to your beachside resort. After check-in and refreshing, proceed to the world-famous Radhanagar Beach (Beach No. 7), consistently ranked among the best beaches in Asia. Spend your afternoon relaxing, swimming, and enjoying the pristine white sands and turquoise waters. Witness a breathtaking sunset by the beach. Overnight stay in Havelock Island.

itinerary.title: Havelock to Neil Island – Natural Wonders
itinerary.description: After breakfast and check-out from your Havelock resort, you will be transferred to the jetty to board a high-speed ferry to Neil Island (now officially known as Shaheed Dweep), a shorter journey of approximately 1-1.5 hours. Upon arrival, you will be met and transferred to your resort in Neil Island. After check-in, explore the island's natural wonders. Visit the unique Natural Rock Bridge formation. Relax at the tranquil Laxmanpur Beach, known for its beautiful sunset views, and Bharatpur Beach, ideal for shallow-water snorkeling and glass-bottom boat rides (optional, direct payment). Enjoy the quiet, laid-back charm of Neil Island. Overnight stay in Neil Island.

itinerary.title: Neil Island to Port Blair

itinerary.description: After breakfast, embark on an exciting full-day excursion via boat to two prominent islands near Port Blair. First, visit Ross Island (now officially known as Netaji Subhash Chandra Bose Dweep), the former administrative headquarters of the British, now home to colonial ruins amidst lush greenery and a deer park. Next, proceed to North Bay Island, famous for its vibrant coral reefs and abundant marine life, making it ideal for snorkeling, sea walking, or glass-bottom boat rides (optional, direct payment). Enjoy the various water sports activities available here. Return to Port Blair by evening. Overnight stay in Port Blair.

title: Himalayan Hues: Gangtok & Lake Serenity
description: Immerse yourself in the vibrant 'Himalayan Hues: Gangtok & Lake Serenity', a captivating 5-day journey to the heart of Sikkim. This package offers a perfect blend of cultural exploration in Gangtok, exhilarating high-altitude lake visits, and opportunities for adventure amidst the stunning Eastern Himalayas. From the spiritual tranquility of monasteries to the mystical charm of Tsomgo Lake, experience the unique beauty and serene atmosphere of this incredible region.
highlights: Enjoy a scenic drive through the breathtaking landscapes of Sikkim to reach Gangtok.
Explore the bustling and vibrant MG Road in Gangtok, the heart of the city.
Embark on a full-day excursion to the mystical Tsomgo Lake (Changu Lake) at 12,400 ft.
Visit the revered Baba Harbhajan Singh Mandir.
Optional visit to Nathula Pass, the Indo-China border (subject to permit and weather conditions).
Discover Gangtok's local attractions including Tashi View Point, Ganesh Tok, and Enchey Monastery.
Learn about Tibetan culture at the Namgyal Institute of Tibetology and admire flora at the Flower Exhibition Centre.
Opportunity for an optional ropeway ride offering panoramic views of Gangtok valley.
Leisure day with options for thrilling river rafting on Teesta or a peaceful visit to Rumtek Monastery.

itinerary.title: Arrival in Gangtok
itinerary.description: Upon your arrival at Bagdogra Airport (IXB) or New Jalpaiguri (NJP) Railway Station, you will be warmly greeted by our representative. Enjoy a scenic drive (approx. 4.5 hours) through picturesque landscapes as you ascend to Gangtok, the charming capital of Sikkim. Upon arrival, check-in to your comfortable hotel. The evening is at your leisure. You can take a relaxed stroll along the pedestrian-only MG Road, the heart of Gangtok, known for its vibrant atmosphere, shops, and local eateries. Enjoy the cool mountain air and local vibes. Overnight stay in Gangtok.

itinerary.title: Tsomgo Lake & Baba Mandir Excursion
itinerary.description: After breakfast at your hotel, embark on a full-day excursion to the enchanting Tsomgo Lake (Changu Lake), situated at an altitude of 12,400 ft. This sacred glacial lake is known for its serene beauty and changes colors with the seasons. Enjoy a yak ride or snow activities (seasonal, on direct payment) by the lakeside. Continue your journey to visit Baba Harbhajan Singh Mandir, a revered shrine dedicated to an Indian Army soldier. You also have the optional opportunity to visit Nathula Pass (Indo-China border) at 14,140 ft, depending on permit availability and weather conditions (extra charges and special permits apply, which need to be arranged in advance and are not guaranteed). Return to Gangtok by evening. Overnight stay in Gangtok.

itinerary.title: Gangtok City Tour
itinerary.description: After breakfast, proceed for a half-day guided city tour of Gangtok. Begin with Tashi View Point for spectacular sunrise views of the Kanchenjunga range (if visited early morning) and panoramic vistas of Gangtok. Visit Ganesh Tok, a small temple with a viewing lounge offering city views. Explore the peaceful Enchey Monastery, an important Nyingma monastery. Delve into Tibetan culture and history at the Namgyal Institute of Tibetology (closed on Sundays) and admire a vibrant collection of orchids and seasonal flowers at the Flower Exhibition Centre. You can also enjoy an optional ropeway ride (on direct payment) over Gangtok valley for stunning aerial views. The rest of the day is free for leisure or exploring local markets. Overnight stay in Gangtok.

itinerary.title: Day at Leisure / Optional Adventure
itinerary.description: Today is a day for leisure or optional adventures. After breakfast, you can choose from the following activities (optional, direct payment): Enjoy an exhilarating River rafting experience in Teesta River (seasonal and subject to weather conditions and group size). Alternatively, embark on a peaceful visit to the magnificent Rumtek Monastery, one of the most important monasteries of the Kagyu sect of Tibetan Buddhism, or take a local village walk to experience the charming rural life of Sikkim. In the evening, you can indulge in some last-minute shopping on MG Road, picking up souvenirs and local handicrafts. Overnight stay in Gangtok.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: After breakfast at your hotel and check-out, you will be transferred to Bagdogra Airport (IXB) or New Jalpaiguri (NJP) Railway Station for your onward journey. Depart with 'Himalayan Hues' and beautiful memories of Sikkim. Package starting from 30,000 INR per person.

title: North East Magic: Sikkim's High-Altitude Wonders
description: Embark on an enchanting 'North East Magic: Sikkim's High-Altitude Wonders' expedition, a comprehensive 7-day tour that unveils the breathtaking beauty of Sikkim. This package takes you through the vibrant capital of Gangtok, the serene landscapes of Lachen and Lachung, and culminates with a visit to the mystical Gurudongmar Lake and the vibrant Yumthang Valley. Experience diverse cultures, stunning mountain vistas, and unique high-altitude adventures in this untouched paradise.
highlights: Enjoy a comfortable transfer from Bagdogra/NJP to the charming capital, Gangtok.
Experience the vibrant atmosphere and local culture with a leisure walk on Gangtok's MG Road.
Embark on a scenic drive to Lachen, witnessing stunning waterfalls and mountain landscapes.
Undertake an early morning journey to Gurudongmar Lake, one of the highest lakes in the world, offering mesmerizing views (subject to permit and weather).
Discover the serene Lachung and the picturesque Yumthang Valley, also known as the 'Valley of Flowers'.
Optional visit to Zero Point (Yumesamdong), offering unparalleled views of snow-capped peaks (additional cost and permit required).
Explore Gangtok's cultural gems including Do Drul Chorten, Handicraft Centre, and Namgyal Institute of Tibetology.

itinerary.title: Arrival in Gangtok
itinerary.description: Upon your arrival at Bagdogra Airport (IXB) or New Jalpaiguri (NJP) Railway Station, you will be warmly greeted by our representative. Enjoy a scenic drive (approx. 4.5 hours) through picturesque landscapes as you ascend to Gangtok, the charming capital of Sikkim. Upon arrival, check-in to your comfortable hotel. The evening is at your leisure. You can take a relaxed stroll along the pedestrian-only MG Road, the heart of Gangtok, known for its vibrant atmosphere, shops, and local eateries. Overnight stay in Gangtok.

itinerary.title: Gangtok to Lachen (9,400 ft / 6 hrs drive)
itinerary.description: After breakfast and completing necessary permits (requires valid ID proofs & photos), begin your picturesque drive to Lachen (approx. 6 hours drive), a beautiful village situated at an altitude of 9,400 ft. En route, marvel at the scenic beauty of Tashi View Point (if time permits), the majestic Seven Sisters Waterfall, and the sacred Chungthang Confluence of the Lachen Chu and Lachung Chu rivers. Upon arrival in Lachen, check-in to your hotel. The evening is free to acclimatize and enjoy the serene surroundings. Overnight stay in Lachen.

itinerary.title: Gurudongmar Lake → Transfer to Lachung
itinerary.description: Wake up early for an exhilarating drive to Gurudongmar Lake (approx. 3-4 hours one way), one of the highest lakes in the world, situated at an astounding altitude of 17,800 ft. (Please note that the visit to Gurudongmar Lake is subject to army permits and prevailing weather conditions. Heavy snowfall can restrict access). After experiencing the mystical beauty of the lake, return to your hotel in Lachen for breakfast and check-out. Post breakfast, drive to Lachung (approx. 2-3 hours drive), a charming village at 8,800 ft. Check-in to your hotel upon arrival. Overnight stay in Lachung.

itinerary.title: Yumthang Valley – Valley of Flowers
itinerary.description: After breakfast, embark on a captivating excursion to Yumthang Valley, famously known as the 'Valley of Flowers' (best visited during spring season for flowers). Adorned with a diverse range of rhododendrons and other alpine flowers, it's a sight to behold. You also have the optional opportunity to visit the local Hot Spring or continue further to Zero Point (Yumesamdong) at 15,300 ft (additional cost and separate permit required, subject to army permission and road conditions). Zero Point offers breathtaking views of snow-capped peaks. After your exploration, return to your hotel in Lachung and enjoy a relaxing evening. Overnight stay in Lachung.

itinerary.title: Lachung to Gangtok
itinerary.description: After breakfast and check-out from your Lachung hotel, begin your scenic drive back to Gangtok (approx. 5-6 hours drive). Upon arrival in Gangtok, check-in to your hotel. The rest of the evening is at your leisure. You can revisit MG Road for some last-minute souvenir shopping or simply relax and recall the mesmerizing experiences of North Sikkim. Overnight stay in Gangtok.

itinerary.title: Gangtok Sightseeing
itinerary.description: After breakfast, proceed for a half-day guided city tour of Gangtok. Visit the majestic Do Drul Chorten, a stupa surrounded by 108 prayer wheels. Explore the unique craftsmanship at the Handicraft Centre and delve into Tibetan culture at the Namgyal Institute of Tibetology (closed on Sundays). You have the optional choice to enjoy a scenic cable car ride over Gangtok valley for panoramic views or spend time café hopping and soaking in the relaxed vibe of the city. The evening is free for leisure or final souvenir shopping. Overnight stay in Gangtok.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: After breakfast at your hotel and check-out, you will be transferred to Bagdogra Airport (IXB) or New Jalpaiguri (NJP) Railway Station for your onward journey. Depart with 'North East Magic' and indelible memories of Sikkim's high-altitude wonders. Package starting from 35,000 INR per person.

inclusions: 3 Nights accommodation in a comfortable hotel in Gangtok.

relatedPackages.title: Mystic Meghalaya: Clouds, Caves & Living Roots

title: Mystic Meghalaya: Clouds, Caves & Living Roots
description: Embark on the 'Mystic Meghalaya: Clouds, Caves & Living Roots' expedition, a captivating 6-day journey through the 'Abode of Clouds'. This package offers a deep dive into the enchanting landscapes, unique culture, and natural wonders of Meghalaya, starting from the vibrant city of Guwahati. Explore serene lakes, majestic waterfalls, ancient caves, Asia's cleanest village, and the incredible living root bridges. Get ready for an unforgettable experience amidst lush greenery and mystical charm.
highlights: Enjoy a scenic drive from Guwahati to Shillong, with a picturesque stop at Umiam Lake.
Explore the charming city of Shillong, visiting its cultural and natural landmarks like Don Bosco Museum, Ward’s Lake, and Elephant Falls.
Discover Cherrapunji, one of the wettest places on Earth, home to dramatic waterfalls and fascinating cave systems.
Witness the awe-inspiring Nohkalikai Falls and explore the ancient Mawsmai Caves.
Experience the crystal-clear waters of the Umngot River with a thrilling boat ride in Dawki.
Visit Mawlynnong, famously known as Asia’s Cleanest Village, and marvel at the ingenious Living Root Bridges.
Explore the spiritual heart of Guwahati with a visit to the revered Kamakhya Temple.
Opportunity to enjoy an optional Brahmaputra River cruise in Guwahati.

itinerary.title: Arrival in Guwahati – Drive to Shillong
itinerary.description: Upon your arrival at Guwahati Airport (GAU) or Guwahati Railway Station (GHY), you will be warmly greeted by our representative. Begin your picturesque journey with a scenic drive to Shillong (approx. 3 hours), the charming capital of Meghalaya. En route, make a refreshing stop at Umiam Lake, also known as Barapani Lake, a vast and serene reservoir surrounded by lush hills. Upon reaching Shillong, check-in to your comfortable hotel. The evening is free for your leisure, allowing you to relax or take a stroll around the hotel vicinity. Overnight stay in Shillong.

itinerary.title: Shillong Sightseeing
itinerary.description: After breakfast, embark on a full-day sightseeing tour of Shillong. Begin your day with a visit to the informative Don Bosco Museum, a unique ethnographic museum showcasing the culture and heritage of the North Eastern states. Continue to the serene Ward’s Lake, a beautiful artificial lake surrounded by a botanical garden. Visit the historic Cathedral Church of Mary Help of Christians. In the afternoon, explore the majestic Elephant Falls, a multi-tiered waterfall nestled amidst lush greenery. Conclude your city tour with a visit to Shillong Peak, the highest point in Shillong, offering panoramic views of the entire city. In the evening, enjoy some local shopping in Police Bazaar, known for its handicrafts and traditional attire. Overnight stay in Shillong.

itinerary.title: Cherrapunji Excursion
itinerary.description: After breakfast, embark on a full-day excursion to Cherrapunji (approx. 2 hours one way), famously known as Sohra, one of the wettest places on Earth. Witness the breathtaking Nohkalikai Falls, the tallest plunge waterfall in India. Explore the fascinating limestone formations of Mawsmai Caves (guided entry, subject to safe conditions). Marvel at the majestic Seven Sisters Falls, also known as Nohsngithiang Falls. You can also visit Eco Park, offering panoramic views of the Bangladesh plains. Experience the misty charm and lush landscapes of Cherrapunji. Return to Shillong by evening. Overnight stay in Shillong.

itinerary.title: Dawki & Mawlynnong – Asia’s Cleanest Village
itinerary.description: After breakfast, embark on an exciting day trip to the Indo-Bangladesh border areas (approx. 2.5-3 hours one way). Begin with Dawki, famous for the Umngot River, known for its crystal-clear waters. Enjoy a mesmerizing boat ride on the Umngot River, where boats appear to float on air. Afterward, proceed to Mawlynnong, acclaimed as 'Asia’s Cleanest Village'. Take a stroll through this pristine village, observing its unique community-based ecotourism initiatives. Visit the nearby Living Root Bridge (Riwai), a remarkable bio-engineering marvel created by the Khasi tribes. Return to Shillong by evening. Overnight stay in Shillong.

itinerary.title: Shillong to Guwahati
itinerary.description: After breakfast and check-out from your Shillong hotel, drive back to Guwahati (approx. 3 hours). Upon arrival, check-in to your hotel. In the afternoon, delve into the spiritual heart of Assam with a visit to the revered Kamakhya Temple, a significant Shakti Peeth located atop Nilachal Hills (if time permits, temple visit might require waiting in queues). You can also opt to visit Umananda Island, the smallest inhabited river island, home to a Shiva temple (optional, ferry ride extra). In the evening, enjoy a relaxing riverfront walk along the Brahmaputra River or opt for a scenic Brahmaputra River Cruise (optional, direct payment) for sunset views and cultural performances. Overnight stay in Guwahati.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: After breakfast at your hotel and check-out, you will be transferred to Guwahati Airport (GAU) or Guwahati Railway Station (GHY) for your onward journey. Depart with 'Mystic Meghalaya' and enchanting memories of the North East. Package starting from 35,000 INR per person.

inclusions: 4 Nights accommodation in a comfortable hotel in Shillong.
1 Night accommodation in a comfortable hotel in Guwahati.

exclusions: Airfare/train fare to and from Guwahati.

title: Mystic Gili Escape

Arrive at Ngurah Rai International Airport (Denpasar) and receive a warm welcome. Private transfer to your hotel in Kuta. Check-in and relax. Evening: Explore Kuta Beach or Beachwalk Shopping Mall. Overnight stay in Kuta.

Experience thrilling watersports at Tanjung Benoa Beach.
Witness the breathtaking sunset and Kecak Dance at Uluwatu Temple.
Discover the stunning natural beauty of Nusa Penida Island, including Angel's Billabong and Kelingking Beach.
Enjoy the serene, car-free paradise of Gili Trawangan and its iconic sunset swing.
Embark on an unforgettable snorkeling adventure around the Gili Islands, encountering underwater statues and vibrant marine life.
Indulge in a luxurious stay at a private pool villa in Ubud.

itinerary.description: Breakfast at hotel and check-out. Fast boat transfer from Padang Bai to Gili Trawangan. Check-in at hotel/resort on the island. Explore the car-free island on bicycle or cidomo (horse cart). Sunset at Ombak Sunset Swing.

itinerary.title: Gili Island Snorkeling Adventure
itinerary.description: Breakfast at hotel. Join a group snorkeling trip around the Gili Islands. Visit Gili Meno, Gili Air. Highlights: Underwater statues, Turtle Point, vibrant coral life. Afternoon at leisure. Enjoy beachside cafes and live music.

itinerary.title: Transfer to Ubud (Private Pool Villa)

itinerary.description: Breakfast at the villa. Full-day Kintamani Highland Tour: Stop at Mount Batur Viewpoint, Visit Bali Swing Experience, See Tegallalang Rice Terraces, Refresh at Tegenungan Waterfall. Return to villa and relax.

itinerary.title: Departure from Bali

Journey to the artistic hub of Florence and marvel at the Duomo, Ponte Vecchio, and the Uffizi Gallery.
Indulge in a full-day guided tour of the picturesque Chianti region in Tuscany, complete with wine tastings and a local lunch.
Enjoy a romantic gondola ride and explore the enchanting St. Mark’s Square in Venice.
Discover the historic landmarks of Venice, including Doge’s Palace, Rialto Bridge, and Bridge of Sighs.

itinerary.description: Arrival at Fiumicino Airport, transfer to hotel. Evening walk through Piazza Navona, Pantheon, and Trevi Fountain. Optional: Welcome dinner with Italian wine tasting.

itinerary.description: Guided tour of Colosseum, Roman Forum, and Palatine Hill. Visit Vatican Museums, Sistine Chapel, and St. Peter’s Basilica. Free time at Spanish Steps or Trastevere.

itinerary.title: Rome → Florence
itinerary.description: High-speed train to Florence (~1.5 hrs). Visit Duomo, Ponte Vecchio, and Uffizi Gallery. Explore artisan streets of Oltrarno.

itinerary.title: Day trip to Tuscany
itinerary.description: Full-day guided tour to Chianti region: Visit two vineyards. Wine tastings & lunch at a local estate.

itinerary.title: Florence → Venice
itinerary.description: Morning train to Venice (~2 hrs). Hotel check-in in the island area. Evening gondola ride & stroll through St. Mark’s Square.

itinerary.title: Venice Discovery
itinerary.description: Guided tour: Doge’s Palace, Rialto Bridge, Bridge of Sighs. Optional: Half-day to Murano & Burano (glass & lace islands).

itinerary.title: Departure from Venice
itinerary.description: Breakfast & transfer to airport (Marco Polo or Treviso).

title: Italy Delight
description: 📍 Base Location: Rome (3N), Amalfi Coast (2N), Florence (2N), Venice (2N), Milan (2N) 🛏️ Hotel: Stay in Rome, Amalfi Coast, Florence, Venice, and Milan as per itinerary. 🗓️ Day 1: Arrival in Rome – Benvenuto a Roma! Arrive at Rome Fiumicino Airport. Meet & greet by our representative. Private transfer to your hotel & check-in. Rest and freshen up. Optional: Welcome dinner in Trastevere, a lively Roman neighborhood with authentic food and cobbled streets. Overnight stay in Rome.
highlights: Immerse yourself in the ancient history of Rome with guided tours of the Colosseum, Roman Forum, and Palatine Hill.
Discover the spiritual heart of Catholicism with visits to the Vatican Museums, Sistine Chapel, and St. Peter’s Basilica.
Experience the breathtaking beauty of the Amalfi Coast, exploring picturesque towns like Positano, Amalfi, and Ravello.
Wander through the artistic and architectural marvels of Florence, including Piazza della Signoria, Florence Cathedral (Duomo), Uffizi Gallery, and Accademia Gallery (David).
Enjoy an iconic Gondola ride through the enchanting canals of Venice and explore St. Mark’s Basilica and Rialto Bridge.
Discover the colorful island of Burano and witness the renowned glass-blowing traditions of Murano.
Immerse yourself in the fashion capital of Milan, visiting the magnificent Duomo di Milano and the luxurious Galleria Vittorio Emanuele II.
Optionally, take a scenic day trip to the stunning Lake Como, often called 'The Pearl of Lake Como' with its charming town of Bellagio.

itinerary.title: Arrival in Rome – Benvenuto a Roma!
itinerary.description: Arrive at Rome Fiumicino Airport. Meet & greet by our representative. Private transfer to your hotel & check-in. Rest and freshen up. Optional: Welcome dinner in Trastevere, a lively Roman neighborhood with authentic food and cobbled streets.

itinerary.title: Ancient Rome & The Vatican
itinerary.description: Breakfast at hotel. Morning guided tour: Colosseum – Explore the iconic gladiator arena. Roman Forum & Palatine Hill – Heart of Ancient Rome. Afternoon guided visit: Vatican Museums – Richest art collection in the world. Sistine Chapel – Michelangelo’s masterpiece. St. Peter’s Basilica – Majestic religious site. Evening at leisure.

itinerary.title: Rome → Amalfi Coast (via Naples)
itinerary.description: Breakfast and check-out. High-speed train to Naples. Private transfer to Sorrento / Positano. Check-in and unwind with stunning coastal views. Relaxing evening by the Tyrrhenian Sea.

itinerary.title: Amalfi Coast Highlights
itinerary.description: Breakfast at hotel. Full-day scenic tour covering: Positano – Picture-perfect cliffside village. Amalfi – Charming seafront town with history. Ravello – Artistic hill town with gardens & views. Optional Add-on: Lemon farm visit or short boat ride along the coast. Return to hotel and relax.

itinerary.title: Amalfi Coast → Florence (via Naples)
itinerary.description: Breakfast & check-out. Private transfer to Naples train station. High-speed train to Florence. Check-in and rest. Evening leisure walk covering: Piazza della Signoria. Florence Cathedral (Duomo). Try authentic Tuscan cuisine at a local trattoria.

itinerary.title: Art & Architecture of Florence (+ Pisa Optional)
itinerary.description: Breakfast at hotel. Morning city walking tour: Uffizi Gallery (optional pre-booked tickets). Ponte Vecchio – Historic bridge. Accademia Gallery (Michelangelo’s David). Optional afternoon trip to Pisa: Visit the Leaning Tower, Baptistery, and Cathedral. Evening at leisure for shopping or exploring artisan boutiques.

itinerary.title: Florence → Venice – The Floating City
itinerary.description: Breakfast and check-out. Train to Venice. Water taxi or transfer to hotel. Afternoon activities: Gondola Ride through canals. Visit St. Mark’s Basilica. Explore Rialto Bridge & Market. Dinner by the Grand Canal.

itinerary.title: Venice Islands – Murano & Burano
itinerary.description: Breakfast at hotel. Half-day tour to: Murano – Famous for glass-blowing demonstrations. Burano – Vibrant fishing island known for lace-making & colorful homes. Return to Venice by afternoon. Evening at leisure – romantic dinner or shopping.

itinerary.title: Venice → Milan – The Fashion Capital
itinerary.description: Breakfast and check-out. High-speed train to Milan. Check-in at hotel. Explore Milan city: Duomo di Milano – Magnificent cathedral. Galleria Vittorio Emanuele II – Iconic shopping arcade. Via Montenapoleone – High-end fashion district. Evening at leisure.

itinerary.title: Day Trip to Lake Como (Optional)
itinerary.description: Breakfast at hotel. Optional full-day excursion: Scenic train ride to Lake Como. Visit Bellagio – “The Pearl of Lake Como”. Take a ferry ride across picturesque lake towns. Return to Milan by evening.

itinerary.title: Departure from Milan
itinerary.description: Breakfast and check-out. Private transfer to Malpensa / Linate Airport. Depart with memories of La Dolce Vita.

title: La Tomatina
description: 📍 Base Location: Madrid (2N), Seville (2N), Valencia (2N), Barcelona (2N) 🛏️ Hotel: Stay in Madrid, Seville, Valencia, and Barcelona as per itinerary. 🗓️ Day 1: Arrival in Madrid. Arrive at Madrid-Barajas Airport. Private transfer to hotel & check-in. Evening tapas walking tour in La Latina district. Overnight in Madrid.
highlights: Experience the vibrant culinary scene of Madrid with an evening tapas walking tour in La Latina district.
Explore iconic Madrid landmarks including the Royal Palace, Puerta del Sol, Plaza Mayor, and the world-renowned Prado Museum.
Journey to the charming city of Seville and wander through the historic Santa Cruz neighborhood and marvel at the Metropol Parasol.
Discover Seville's grandeur with a guided tour of the magnificent Seville Cathedral & La Giralda, the Royal Alcazar, and the expansive Plaza de España, followed by an authentic Flamenco performance.
Immerse yourself in Valencia's blend of old and new, from its charming Old Town to the futuristic City of Arts and Sciences.
Dive into marine life at Oceanogràfic, Europe's largest aquarium, and savor authentic paella in its birthplace.
Experience the bustling energy of Barcelona, strolling along La Rambla, exploring the Gothic Quarter, and enjoying the mesmerizing Magic Fountain Show.
Be captivated by Gaudí's architectural masterpieces in Barcelona, including the Sagrada Família, Park Güell, and Casa Batlló.

itinerary.title: Arrival in Madrid
itinerary.description: Arrive at Madrid-Barajas Airport. Private transfer to hotel & check-in. Evening tapas walking tour in La Latina district.

itinerary.title: Madrid Highlights
itinerary.description: Guided tour of: Royal Palace, Puerta del Sol, Plaza Mayor, Prado Museum. Optional: Flamenco show in the evening.

itinerary.title: Madrid → Seville (Train)
itinerary.description: High-speed AVE train to Seville (2.5 hrs). Explore Santa Cruz neighborhood & Metropol Parasol. Optional: Guadalquivir River Cruise.

itinerary.title: Seville City Tour
itinerary.description: Guided tour of: Seville Cathedral & La Giralda, Royal Alcazar, Plaza de España. Evening Flamenco performance.

itinerary.title: Seville → Valencia (Train)
itinerary.description: Morning train to Valencia (~5 hrs). Evening walk in Old Town & City of Arts and Sciences (outside view).

itinerary.title: Valencia Exploration
itinerary.description: Visit Oceanogràfic (largest aquarium in Europe). Explore Turia Gardens and Valencia Cathedral. Taste authentic paella where it originated.

itinerary.title: Valencia → Barcelona (Train)
itinerary.description: Morning high-speed train to Barcelona (~3.5 hrs). Visit La Rambla, Gothic Quarter, and Magic Fountain Show at night.

itinerary.title: Gaudí’s Barcelona
itinerary.description: Guided tour of: Sagrada Família, Park Güell, Casa Batlló. Optional: Sunset at Bunkers del Carmel.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: Breakfast & transfer to airport for your return flight.

title: Bonjour Paris
description: Say 'Bonjour' to the City of Lights with our enchanting 'Bonjour Paris' package. This 5-day itinerary offers a quintessential Parisian experience, blending iconic landmarks, historical grandeur, and magical entertainment. From ascending the Eiffel Tower and cruising the Seine to exploring the opulent Palace of Versailles and immersing yourself in the fantasy world of Disneyland Paris, this package promises an unforgettable journey through one of the world's most romantic and vibrant cities.
highlights: Experience the romance of Paris with an evening Seine River Cruise, featuring music, wine, and stunning views of the illuminated Eiffel Tower.
Ascend to the 2nd level of the Eiffel Tower for breathtaking panoramic city views.
Discover Paris's most famous landmarks on a guided city tour, including Arc de Triomphe and Champs-Élysées.
Step back in time with a visit to the magnificent Palace of Versailles, exploring its opulent interiors and sprawling gardens.
Unleash your inner child with a full day of magic and excitement at Disneyland Paris.
Enjoy the charming ambiance of Parisian cafes and explore the city's vibrant streets.

itinerary.title: Arrival in Paris
itinerary.description: Upon your arrival at Charles de Gaulle Airport (CDG), you will be met by our representative and transferred to your comfortable hotel for check-in. After settling in, the evening offers a magical introduction to Paris with a delightful **Seine River Cruise**. Enjoy the enchanting views of the city's illuminated monuments, including the iconic Eiffel Tower, accompanied by music and a glass of wine. Overnight stay in Paris.

itinerary.title: Paris City Highlights
itinerary.description: After breakfast, embark on a comprehensive half-day guided tour of Paris's most famous highlights. Your tour includes a visit to the iconic **Eiffel Tower with 2nd level entry**, offering breathtaking panoramic views of the city. Drive past and admire the majestic **Arc de Triomphe** and stroll along the glamorous **Champs-Élysées**. You'll also pass by the famous **Louvre Museum** (outside visit; entry is optional and additional). The evening is free for leisure, perhaps for some shopping, or you can opt for a dazzling **Cabaret show** at Moulin Rouge or Lido (optional, additional cost). Overnight stay in Paris.

itinerary.title: Versailles Day Trip
itinerary.description: Today, immerse yourself in royal history with a full-day trip to the magnificent **Palace of Versailles**. Enjoy included entry and a guided tour of this opulent former royal residence, exploring its lavish apartments, the famous **Hall of Mirrors**, and the grand royal gardens. Witness the grandeur and extravagance that once defined the French monarchy. Return to Paris by evening, and perhaps unwind at a charming Parisian café. Overnight stay in Paris.

itinerary.title: Disneyland Paris
itinerary.description: After breakfast, prepare for a day of enchantment and adventure at **Disneyland Paris**. Enjoy a full-day pass to one park (Disneyland Park or Walt Disney Studios Park; 2-park options available at additional cost), where you can meet beloved characters, experience thrilling rides, and witness spectacular parades and shows. Immerse yourself in the magic of Disney. Return to Paris in the late evening, filled with magical memories. Overnight stay in Paris.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: After a final breakfast at your hotel, enjoy some free time until your scheduled transfer to Charles de Gaulle Airport (CDG) for your departure, carrying wonderful memories of your 'Bonjour Paris' adventure. Package starting from 80K per person.

inclusions: 4 Nights accommodation in a comfortable hotel in Paris.
